name: Ghost Weightless Oil to Fight Frizz and Enhance Shine
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is:A weightless, restorative oil that hydrates, strengthens, and smooths strands for shiny, frizz-free hair..Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, and Curly.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Hydrates.Formulation:Lightweight Oil.Highlighted Ingredients:- Moringa Seed Oil: Moisturizes, detangles, and smooths hair..Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES and parabens. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This weightless moringa oil blend works to smooth frizz and promote shine for all hair types. It contains bamboo extract and argan oil to strengthen hair, prevent breakage, and retain moisture for sleek, easy styling. A hint of grapefruit and oatmeal blend together to leave hair with a light, fresh fragrance.
ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Caprylyl Methicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Bambusa Vulgaris (Bamboo) Extract, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Glyceryl Linoleate, Tocopherol, Water, Glycerin, Fragrance, Polysilicone-15, Glyceryl Linolenate, Potassium Sorbate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Linalool, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use two to three drops on damp or dry hair to weightlessly eliminate frizz, smooth flyaways, and add all-over shine.

I never use a hair dryer so my experience is based on these steps .I towel dry my hair straight out of the shower. I squeeze a few pumps into the palm of my hand while I bend forward with my long hair hanging downward I press the product between the palms of my hands then I gather hair into the palms of my hands crunching at the ends and then I spread the product all over my hair in between my palms. I work my way to my roots and I rub the rest of the product on top of my head. then I brush/comb my hair to make sure the product is fully spread throughout my hair. I then throw my hair in a bun. when my hair is finally dry I am just baffled at how soft and smooth my hair is! it's literally softer then a little puppy with soft puppy fur!!! I'm just kind of bummed that I'm nearly out of my samples and will have to pay $20!for the same size bottles I got free! it's ok tho. it's well worth it!

I used the K-Pak serum by Joico for many years which is supposed to add shine & protect from heat damage. It's my belief that anything that coats the strands will offer some protection.  I have lots of baby hairs around my hair line and this product keeps them in check, making it super simple to get my hair sleek and in line with a low-heat infrared flat iron.  Definitely recommend!  I live in a dry climate and this product has changed my hair for the better.

reviews.review_text: I first tried this as a trial size along with one of my previous orders. The small 17ml bottle lasted me 6 months, even though I have plenty of hip length hair that is naturally curly in texture, however the strands themselves are somewhere between fine and thick, so medium size strands? Any how, i would use this oil after every shower, separating the hair into two sections and applying the ghost oil to the lengths, beginning from the ears down, and with any left over on my hands would smooth the light frizz at the roots, however I’ve never really applied the oil to the roots. With the trial size lasting 6 months, I saw a dramatic improvement, my hair would always feels super soft and virtually frizz free every time I used it, and it was noticeable when I skipped the oil step. I ended up finishing up the oil approximately two weeks before I ordered the full size. Those two weeks without the oil, my hair tangled more easy, my ends felt dry, and my hair was no longer as soft feeling and I was experiencing more frizz. While I wish the bottle was bigger in size, I can say this product is worth the $20CA, and will continue to use the ghost oil after every shower until I find something even better, which for the price of this product I doubt I will find a replacement anytime soon. A definite 5/5 for me, even though I wish the bottle was bigger for the price, seeing as how I’m a gal on a budget, but for nice feeling hair I can’t complain, especially since I haven’t had a haircut since before the 2020 pandemic began in March of last year. Also love the pump on this product, however not the biggest fan of the sent, which I’m happy doesn’t stick around for long and usually have to smell the oil itself just to get a whiff of it. Still 5/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I hardly ever write reviews on products but this hair oil has changed my hair so immensely I HAD to write about it and let others know. I am born and raised in super humid Florida, almost 30 yrs old with long color treated blonde hair, and have struggled to keep my hair not frizzy and smooth my whole life. I usually straighten my hair but once I step outside for a bit, I have tiny frizzy baby hairs or fly aways and my hair is more course feeling and starting to get wavy. I put a pump throughout towel dried hair post shower, brush my hair, dry it however and straighten it, and it's a night and day difference. it's shiny, soft, straight and flowy. I'm hooked for life!!!

reviews.review_title: It's both good and bad, sort of
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I personally like this hair oil. I have textured swavy hair that I've recently started to embrace after a lifetime of brushing it out straight. But my hair gets VERY frizzy when I wear it naturally unless I use a hair gel. I use this hair oil to scrunch out the gel cast or to tame frizz on non-wash days. It's super lightweight which is great for me as products can easily weigh my hair down.  Now I am not a strict follower of the CG method, but if you are you won't want to use this product. It does contain non-water soluble silicones which can only be removed with sulfates. So really anyone that strictly follows a no-sulfate hair care routine should stay away from this because silicones will build up on your hair and cause problems over time.  Having said that, I like the way silicones make my hair feel. Silicones not only make your hair feel soft and smooth, but they act as a fantastic thermal protectant. So if you are going to heat style your hair, silicones will protect your hair from damage. But in a way that makes this Ghost Oil kind of a fake product, because it's not the oils in this that make your hair feel good, it's likely the abundance of silicones that are. I don't believe that this product is in any way good for your hair, but it does make it feel nice and serve as an excellent heat protectant.   But this is the reason I'm giving this product 4 stars instead of 5, because the ingredients really aren't great. So use this sparingly and with discretion. If using this daily, I would definitely recommend a weekly clarifying wash with a sulfate shampoo. But in general I recommend a sulfate wash the same week you use this oil, or any products with silicone. It's the ONLY way to remove silicones.

reviews.review_title: Makes my crunchy, dry, bleached hair soooo soft
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OK, first of all, WOW. This product is amazing. I have very fine, fragile, straight hair, which I’ve recently put through 6 rounds of lightening. And before that, I had box-dyed my hair a variety of dark colors — including blue-black — for years. I’m talking box dye over top of box dye over top of box dye. So lightening it was difficult, and my hair suffered quite a bit. It was so crunchy, dry, and tangle-prone. I tried a bunch of hair masks, leave-in treatments, deep conditioners, and all of the coconut, argan, avocado, and sweet almond oils my hair could hold. But nothing was able to make my hair feel soft again. I decided to try this because of the reviews and the low price, and I am so so glad I did. I couldn’t believe how soft my hair felt after the first use. I can actually run my fingers through my hair without them getting caught. And considering how much breakage I cause when I detangle my hair, this has really been a savior for my hair. I put a full pump in my hair after towel-drying, and on days when I’m not washing my hair, I’ll put just a few drops in to freshen it up. It is AMAZING how lightweight it is. It doesn’t weigh my hair down in the slightest. I do recommend (if your hair is dry and porous like mine) to use other hydrating products, because I feel like this product doesn’t really hydrate my hair a whole lot, but instead sort of locks in moisture that would otherwise just evaporate right out of my porous hair. I like using Redken’s All Soft Mega Hydramelt then following it up with this ghost oil. Without the hydrating step beforehand, my hair does feel soft, but somehow still looks dry (a combo I didn’t even know was possible). But if I use the hydramelt without using the ghost oil, my hair just isn’t as soft/shiny and definitely doesn’t stay hydrated nearly as long. I can’t imagine that I’ll ever stop using this product, because it has changed my hair game.

With this I have found I can use 2 pumps on my wet hair without it being weighed down. It makes my hair incredibly soft and shiny and it helps tame frizz on my non wash days. I currently use another brands primer and it does work well with it, but I’m so impressed by this that I may try the ghost oil primer when this runs out! And the price point is so affordable for the value !

However, my hair is stick straight to start, and frizz/poofiness is definitely the opposite of my problems, and this oil tends to make it even flatter. Plus, you have to spend extra time smoothing it and rubbing it across all your strands to distribute evenly and prevent strands from clumping and looking greasy. This is the case for most hair oils, I guess, but I've been using this for 2 months and still haven't figured out a way around this.   I'd recommend for curly and wavy hair types that DO want to take the volume away from your hair, or if you're planning on heat styling it after anyways.

reviews.review_text: Verb Ghost Oil  I recently purchased verb ghost oil to swap out for a usual routine of leave in conditioner in an attempt to add more moisture to my hair. If you have damage from heat tools or coloring your hair and struggle with dry, dull, or frizzy hair this is a good product to add shine and manageability and tame frizz and costs less than a lot of salon brands.   Add Shine  One or two pumps of this oil goes a long way, if you have dry ends or are prone to breakage you can easily coat your strands in this oil to boost shine and add softness. Ghost oil is a great name for this product because it does not weigh hair down or cause hair to look stringy like a heavier oils like coconut oil might do. If you have not used an oil product on your hair before start with one pump and rub between your palms then distribute evenly through your hair from the ends up. You can add more oil as you go if you feel that your hair is still dry or dull.  Fight Frizz  This product can work for you whether you have straight or curly hair and has long lasting results. This multipurpose oil can be used as a heat protectant when added to wet hair before styling and gives a very smooth finish. Adding this to hair while wet helps to create softness and manageability especially if you have wavy hair as the formula does not weigh down curls. For the best results when reducing frizz add another pump once hair is dry.   Budget Friendly   As hair oils become more popular choosing the right one can be difficult. When looking at products you will want to choose the one with the most value; although this bottle is two ounces a small amount of product goes a long way making this last a long time. Many salon brands can run upward of $30. This ingredient conscious brand gives high quality products at a budget friendly price of $16.    If you are looking for a hair oil that adds shine, manageability, and fights frizz this is a great quality product at a very reasonable price.

I use about a quarter size glob for my whole head of hair, which i have a LOT of. It make my hair shiny and smooths my ends. It  eliminated my frizz by about 80%. The best part is that it doesn't weigh down my natural waves!  This price is comparable to drug store brands, but it has a luxury brand payoff. Since i have oily hair, i skip conditioner often so i rely on my leave in treatments for moisture and this product perfectly replaces any conditioner i have tried. LOVE it!
Best hair oil I have ever used. Use it alone or as a shield against heat.
My thick hair loves this oil! It feels so soft and the smell is amazing. A little goes a long way and a great value.
This is perfect to fight frizz off next day hair! I love the scent and feel.

I received this a while back in my Play! Box. I use it right on towel dried hair! Once my hair dries it feels pretty soft! Rather than it being weighed down. Most hair oils or serums I've used make my hair feel greasy afterward. But if I don't use anything on my hair. It gets pretty tangled. So this oil does the job and I could see and feel a noticeable difference. It's smooth! I'm going to purchase the full size eventually. For the price it isn't bad either!
I didn't like this product the oil is very thick and hard to apply to dry hair. Also had to use 5 drops and my hair is still dry and appears as damaged as it really is!
This is the loveliest hair oil. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: Smoothing, nourishing, smells good, not greasy.
reviews.review_text: This makes my hair shiny and soft without making it greasy and stringy-looking. I have very thick, coarse, wavy hair that is extremely hard to control. This does the best job out of anything I've ever used. I wanted something that would tame my hair but that would also help make it healthy without a bunch of chemicals and this seems to do the trick.
I got this in my Sephora Play box. I love it! It was a great way to get rid of my frizz or reduce it for the day ahead.

I'm very impressed! I have long, straight hair which I usually air dry. The South Florida humidity usually leaves it a frizzy mess and I've tried many products but nothing has worked like Ghost Oil. It leaves my hair soft, shiny and really controls my frizz. This will be my go to from now on. It simply works!
Favourite hair product of all time - I used to use Moroccan oil and this is heaps better and the price is very reasonable.
It's so light weight, makes my hair shine and it has the most faint/beautiful scent to it. Will be repurchasing as soon as it's out.  Wish it came in a bigger container!!
This is a great hair oil.  It leaves damp hair with a silky texture, tames frizz, and makes hair radiant.  It does not leave an oily or greasy residue even on 2nd day hair.

Great stuff! I put two pumps in my wet hair after I shower and it makes my hair touchable. It somehow keeps from being oily, even after a day or two of applications when I feel my hair getting parched.

I received this product in my March Sephora Playbox. I'm a Jamacian Black Castor lover, but needed a lighter oil while traveling so I took my sample. This oil was lighter with no parabens and sulfates.  It builds well as I used every other day for two weeks. I used it to add moisture in the morning. It doesn't do well nightly for LOC method. My 4B/4C hair was not heavier as you can expect with other oils. My hair ends were frizz controlled. No complaints. I would purchase as a leisure style oil.

A friend recommended this product to me and I have to say I'm in love. I apply on towel dried hair and then blow dry/style - my hair is super soft, strong and shiny! For reference, I have bleached hair which is dry and breaks easily.
I use it on dry hair and my hair is so soft and smooth.  Love verb!

The oil itself is very lightweight and smells really nice. I put in on my hair and it instantly feels softer- but not smoother. It doesn't really help with frizzing at all or the actual appearance of my hair. It just makes it smell nice and feel nice. Still looking for an oil that will actually defrizz my crazy hair /:

reviews.review_title: I had high hopes but it's not horrible
reviews.review_text: I honestly thought this was going to work wonders on my hair but it's just average! I was looking for an oil product that I can apply after stilying my hair to make it feel silky and look shiny, this didn't do either. My hair looks healthy (cause it is healthy) but when I run my fingers through it, it doesn't feel incredible soft it feels super normal, kinda on the dry side but my hair is dry....
Literally invisible but takes and smooths and leaves hair silly soft!

This hair very lightweight and perfect for blonde hair! If you have bleached hair that more ashy and wants to keep it that way it's important to use oils that aren't yellow to not make your hair brassy. Can't beat the price either!

As a product junkie I have tried a lot of different hair oils and serums. This one is by far the best. Adds shine and controls frizz without weighing my hair down. The best part is it's not super expensive. Will be repurchasing.
This oil is the bee's knees! I have bleached long thick hair and this gets my curls back! It is thick so you only need a little bit!  My hair feels like it's never been chemically treated!

life changing product! I have tried too many hair oils to count and this is the absolute best. it is light yet effective, smells great and the cost is very reasonable. leaves hair soft and manageable. do not hesitate to buy this you will be glad that you did

I got a sample size of this in a subscription service and I fell in love. I used it daily and my hair was softer, smoother, got tangled much less easily, and looked so naturally shiny. After going through every drop of the sample, I forgot to buy a new bottle, and I saw my hair lacking shine, and the benefits it provided. I quickly bought the full size version, and I never want to be out again.

I have thick, fine-texured, straight/wavy hair that is really prove to little baby flyaways and frizz at the ends. Just one pump of Ghost Oil spread on my palms and finger-combed through my hair makes an incredible difference! It tames all the frizz at the ends and lends an amazing shine; my hair goes from 'didn't bother to style it' to looking put together in no time. Such a steal at this price point, with this effectiveness. Loveeeee.

reviews.review_title: my ride or die hair oil!
reviews.review_text: I Love Love Love!! this hair oil. I first tested it out when I received a sample in my playbox and I just have been addicted ever since. I have long chemically treated hair that thick and most hair oils would knot my ends. this however does not, the texture is so light weight. the dry time is minimum and i have 1 in my purse ALWAYS

Love love love this!  I have long, medium thick hair.  The ends tend to be dry (do to split ends).  This stuff makes all my hair shiny & soooo soft.  I put it on right after the shower, focusing on the ends (avoiding roots)
I used to buy the Bumble and Bumble hair oil, but this is so much better and at a much better price. It's incredibly light weight but gets the job done.

reviews.review_title: One use and I'm in love!
reviews.review_text: I made this purchase after being tired of months of my standard Bumble and Bumble routine just not cutting it anymore. A little backstory: This past February my stylist stepped up my bleaching a bit in order to change my hair from a purple to coral color and it has left my hair more dry than usual. I have a frizzy hair type to begin with, so my standard routine prior to blow drying is to apply B&B tonic, repair cream and their UV oil to my damp hair. even with these 3 products I still found myself struggling to blow dry my hair straight in a reasonable fashion. I had to use multiple boar bristle brushes to achieve a smooth texture and even then my hair poofed a bit and felt dry.   This morning I used this Ghost Oil in place of the B&B UV oil and I could tell an immediate change! My drying time decreased greatly since I didn't find myself needing to switch my brushes in between or doing multiple runs through. My hair is so soft after as well and there is no poof! My hair looks healthy and not like dry straw and I am so please. A little went a long way for me, just one pump. I was also concerned with leaving this oil in my damp hair while I applied my make-up since that has typically left my hair oily when drying other brands, but this did not leave an oil streaks. This was a great purchase a I cannot wait to see what continued use does for my hair.

I got this in a gift set from Sephora with the Verb Hydrating shampoo and conditioner. The three combined have proven to work wonders on my hair. I have naturally curly hair, and 2-3 pumps of the Ghost Oil has significantly decreased the amount of other styling products I have had to use. It's also 90 degrees with 90% humidity here in the Iowa summer, and it's soft and frizz-free. I love it!
I have dry frizzy hair that is prone to breakage. This stuff is amazing! It makes my hair shiny and sleek without being heavy or greasy. I live in Alberta and this is a must have for winters!
Ghost oil is a MUST have. I use it every single day. It keeps my fine hair, shiny, light and healthy to the touch. Love it.
Love this stuff! The scent is light, the price is great. I use a dime sized drop and use both hands to smooth through my hair after I've blow dried, or straightened. Makes it so shiny and smooth!!
I use it before straightening my hair. Makes it soooo soft and smooth. Definitely recommend!

I have very damaged hair due to bleaching and heat but after using this product, i can see immediate difference in the texture of my hair. Don't get me wrong, It doesn't fix all the damage but it's enough to make it soft and nice again! It doesn't weight my hair down like I expected it to and def werth every penny!

Worth every penny! I use a drop about the size of a penny for the ends of my hair (just above neck down). It's not greasy, it doesn't weigh my hair down, and it doesn't have a scent. It helps my flyaways and makes my damaged ends look healthy.

i have 3b curly hair and this stuff is a gem! i got this as a sample and it's lasted me forever. It has a very light, nice scent and the oil is heavy without weighing my hair down. I was going to buy moroccanoil but this is so much cheaper. it also makes my hair very smooth when i straighten it.

this oil is THE BOMB. I have straight, fine strands but a TON of hair, plus it's long. I used to confuse this with thick hair, but it's a different beast. Most hair oils just weigh down my strands and leave me greasy at the end of the day but THIS STUFF!! This stuff is amazing. I use 5-6 drops, rubbed all over my palms and distributed from the ends up, on dry hair. The result is suuuper soft, smooth strands that feel amazing without any grease or weight. I am obsessed and feel like I have rich girl hair every day. thanks, Verb!

Considering the price and effectiveness, it is really a steal - compared to similar products, the price point is not as pricey and makes hair shiny and smooth.  I would take off half a star for how heavily fragrant it is, but the fragrance is nice. I usually do not enjoy heavy fragrances in my skincare/beauty products, especially considering that they could be irritants (I have very sensitive skin).  I've gotten many compliments on both smell & look of my hair while using this (: The little goes a long way adage rings true for this product - I've had this for half a year now, using it after every wash, and it isn't even a quarter gone. The product works well with wet or dry hair, but I've found that it does work better with wet hair as it allows your hair to dry faster and locks in the moisture from the damp hair. This product is really amazing as it leaves your hair shiny without looking greasy or feeling weighed down - an experience that I have had with other hair oils at higher price points. Would definitely recommend!!!

Love this product! Don't need to use too much. Work way from roots to ends. Doesn't leave hair greasy and smells really feminine! Leaves hair nice and smooth good for dry damaged hair! Will be buying this again, recommended.

I swear by this product- it's a miracle product for dry/frizzy hair. My natural hair is dark and frizzy and I bleached it to blonde; this product helps IMMENSELY with the dryness and frizz. It's a very light weight, non-gready oil and smells great (I think it's lightly grapefruit scented). I usually use one pump for the ends of my hair, and it's enough to keep my hair shiney and considerably less-frizzy for a whole day. I've recommended it to friends whole also have color treated hair, and they love it too!

reviews.review_title: I will absolutely be buying this again!!
reviews.review_text: I got this in my Play box a month or two ago and I absolutely love it. It leaves your hair so soft and silky!!  I have fine hair with lots of flyaways. I don't typically use a lot of products because they always end up wearing my hair down, but this doesn't do that at all. I'm fairly prone to split ends and breakage so this has really helped soften my hair up and fight frizz. You can use it on wet or dry hair and it always feels amazing. Are use about a dime size amount, start at my ends and then run whatever's left on my hands up to my roots.   I'm so excited to repurchase this, I can't believe it's only $14.
I have never written a review before but this stuff is magic! Makes my hair silky soft, brings new life to my extensions too
Love love! It tames down my crazy frizzy hair. I have a lot of curly frizzy hair and it helps tame it. A little goes a long way
My hair is very dry and my ends look very very bad normally, thankfully the Verb Ghost Oil helps with that! I completely recommend it!

really nice light oil, that tames frizzy dry split ends, but doesn't make your hair greasy.  the smell isnt strong, and the oil isnt sticky on your hand either.  It absorbs fairly quickly as well, which makes styling easier.

I don't know how how truly restorative this oil it, but it certainly keeps my hair sleek and also keeps my ends from tangling up and adds shine. It's not heavy and i find it does need to be re-applied daily, but for me this is great because that means it's not creeping up the hair shaft to make my scalp oily. Got this in a Play! box and re-ordered the full size.
Love this stuff. Nice light scent that doesn't make my fine hair greasy. A little goes a long way. Will definitely buy again.
I love this stuff. It smells light and fresh, and manages to keep my hair shiny and frizz free.
Just got a sample of this and my hair as never felt smoother! It's so much better than my old hair oil. Its very light and weightless but has incredible results. I am definitely buying the full size

It's not bad. Smells nice and it helps contain frizz a little bit, but nothing out of this world. Nothing incredibly noticeable and what would be worth buying this over something you can find at the drug store.

I got a sample of this in one of my play boxes. I usually don't try out the hair products that are included in those boxes but I decided to try this one out at random. All I say can is that I LOVE this stuff! The oil is so light and doesn't leave a greasy feel on my hair or my hands. The smell is very nice and soothing as well! I was super shocked because most of the hair oils I've used thus far haven't made a huge impact on the feel of my hair but this product has made my dry, treated hair feel so soft. I will be purchasing the full size once I run out!

I received a sample of this in my play box. I have frizzy, thick, wavy hair. This makes my hair so soft! A little goes a long way and for the price this is such a good deal. Love love love this. Can't recommend enough!

I first tried this product as a sample that came in my Sephora play box. I was skeptic about using this product in my hair because I have curly ethnic hair and I truly hate using oils or pomades since I don't like that greasy hair feeling. BUT this oil doesn't leave your hair greasy to the touch which I love and I also love how it keeps your hair soft and healthy looking and moisturized! AND it smells amazing. I love using this with other products when I have curly hair or use it alone when I blow dry my hair. And my hair comes out super straight and soft when I straighten it. Definitely worth the full size bottle and it's inexpensive. I don't know how they make this oil literally non-greasy but it's like magic lol

I never leave reviews for products, despite trying all different beauty products. But this one deserves the praise!!! My hair is thin and straight, but I have a lot of it. Even when I blow dry and use a straightening iron, it still poofs out and doesn't get perfectly straight.  I use 2 pumps in my hair when it's wet and after blowdrying my hair is totally transformed. This product doesn't make it heavy or greasy, even the second day.

I wish they made this in a bigger size but a little goes a longggg way. I have medium length hair and I need about 2-3 pumps to get through most of my hair. It is lightweight and non-greasy. Sometimes I use it on my baby hairs on the top of my head but it never makes me look oily whatsoever. I've tried a lot of oils, more than I care to admit and this is hands down life changing. LIFE CHANGING.

I gifted a bottle of the Ghost Oil to my coworker who has wavy and frizzy hair. She was amazed on how great this product worked on her hair. Everyone at the office noticed the difference. After trying so many products I believe she has found the one.
This has a nice citrusy scent, and I find I only need a few drops of it to work through my hair (wavy, average thickness, and long). It smooths everything down very well.

reviews.review_title: Great for my thick wavy hair!
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of leaving conditioners, oils, etc etc but everyone noticed a (great) difference once I started using the verb oil. It's not heavy at all! I apply it right after I wash my hair and brush it out with my fingers. Amazing! Highly recommend!
This is the best I've found so far for my wavy and frizzy hair. Leaves my hair smooth and healthy looking. Love it! Lasts all day too!
I'm So  Happy!!! Finally I've found something that works great with my crazy curls and tame them!

I have been looking forever for a product to calm down my hair - no frizz.  I have finally found it.  I have naturally curl hair.  I blow dry my hair to straighten it.  My hair comes out so beautiful when I apply the Ghost Oil before drying it.  LOVE it!

As I get older (just hit half-century), my hair has changed from the fine texture of my youth to the frizzy grays of midlife. My hair is in good condition but the grays need a little extra TLC. The Ghost OI is the perfect remedy. It's lightweight, non-greasy and leaves my hair feeling silky after a blowdry. If you are looking for an oily that's not heavy and actually works, look no further.

I'm not one to normally write online reviews, but this product MUST be shared. It has completely changed my hair. I have thick, wavy, frizzy hair. Since I've been getting keratin treatments, and I swim, the texture felt strawy and gross and the ends were very dry. I started using this product about a month ago, putting a bit more on the ends after a shower and combing a dollop through. I can't stop touching my hair - it feels so soft and shiny. It's not oily at all, and multiple people have told me how great my hair looks. I tell them all about this product!

I purchased this after trying and loving the verb volume shampoo and conditioner.   my thin,  fine hair LOVES this stuff!!  my hair can't handle much product without being weighed down and looking greasy,  but this oil is so lightweight, it feels like a dream both on blow dried and air dried hair.   I will definitely repurchase.

Have been using for a month now and I love this oil! Received a sample in my Sephora play and a little goes a long way. I use on damp hair before I blow dry and have seen huge reduction in friz in my hair caused by southern humidity. Will definitely be purchasing.

This is helping my hair to balance and protect my ends as I grow it out. It is nongreasy and very very lightweight so my greasy scalp doesn't get nasty if I accidentally get some on the top of my head, instead of just the ends. I love it.

reviews.review_title: Best thing to happen to my hair
reviews.review_text: Lightly defines without crunch, makes hair soft and shiny, feels super natural. I have slightly waivey hair that is very prone to frizz, and in the muggy, humid days we've been having, I have been miraculously frizz free for the first time in my life!! Love it.
This is the only oil I have used that actually makes my hair so much easier to style. I have super curly hair that's majorly prone to frizz. Officially obsessed.

I was disappointed with this oil because it definitely stays in your hair after washing. I have a TON of hair so light oils don't do it for my hair. This one, however, was really difficult to wash out.

Revived this in my Play bag and I fell in love! Totally weightless and non-greasy. Totally buying this! Recommend to EVERYONE. I have a really oily scalp and was skeptical putting this on my hair before blow drying and I was blown away (pun intended). My hair was super soft like buttah to the touch (even with the split ends).

I dont know why this oil makes my scalp it everytime! IT's the only thing new to my hair routine. I try to apply it just a bit below the scalp but after 30 minutes of using,i'd get itchy and have little pimple like bumps on my scalp. So disappointing to give this a low rating. I had high expectations

I got this in my play box.  I have damaged hair due to constant coloring. After I use this oil on damp hair,  it really protects my hair from heat and keeps my hair shine.  Also my hair gets less greasy with this oil.  I will definitely purchase full size product.

Received a sample of this my play box and I loved it soooo much I bought the full size. It's so wonderful for my hair and so lightweight but very hydrating. I notice a huge difference every time I use it

I was really shocked by this product.  When I first got it, I put one pump in my hand and really was concerned about how thick this oil was - I thought my hair was going to be a grease slick, but I tried it anyway. After blow drying, and using a little more oil to flat iron my hair - it looked at felt amazing.  I can even go a few days between washes too.  Totally love it.

WOW is really all I can say about this product. As the video displayed, I put one pump into damp hair after showering (the ends and length) and one pump into hair after styling with a straightener or curling iron.   This works FANTASTIC with straightening hair as it smoothes the ends and makes them look way better and not dried out. I have ombre hair so my ends are quite processed and this stuff is magic.  HOWEVER, the size of the bottle is so disappointing lol. When I opened the box I was like aw :( its so little.

No joke the best hair oil I have ever used. Light, pleasant scent, absorbs easily, and I can massage the excess into my hands without it feeling oily or sticky, just nicely moisturized. I have a trial size but as soon as it's empty I'm buying a full size bottle. Looking forward to trying other products from this brand!

This is my new holy grail hair oil. I've been able to cut out all other leave in products now and just use this. I apply two pumps then emulsify in my hands and rub through my hair starting at the ends and going up to the roots. I do this on damp hair after washing then allow my hair to air dry. I apply one more pump to dry hair before flat ironing. My hair is incredibly soft and shiny but most importantly it feels clean and light weight. Despite this being a heavier texture oil it truly does ghost in your hair and leaves a weightless moisture. I have bleached blonde dry brittle hair and this leaves me smooth and soft. It doesn't feel heavy or sticky and I don't have to wash my hands right after use. I love that it seems to absorb in and doesn't look greasy at all. It's a little expensive considering the bottle is only 2 oz. but considering I can dump my other leave ins and get the same soft moisturized hair -it evens out. For reference I was obsessed with the agave healing oil and fekkai mending elixir prior to finding this and it gives me the same results but is much lighter.

reviews.review_title: forget your Argan morrocan and macadamia products
reviews.review_text: get. this. you won't be disappointed.

Got this in my play box and I was not that excited at first. However, with it getting hotter and more humid out, which makes my hair frizz up and get crazy, I started using it. I started using it throughout the hair but focusing on the ends and I can definitely tell the difference when I don't use it. Even out in the humidity and heat for hours this keeps my hair tamed and not looking like a lions mane.

I'm not sure why some ppl say this makes their hair greasy/oily. I have natural wave and some curl hair. That gets oily easy. This does not make my hair oily at all. I apply it after I take my hair out of the towel. I dnt put it on my roots from about middle of my head down to the tip. My hair is long it does help with the frizz I have I can tell a difference if I dnt use it. Normally after I apply it I blow dry my hair, a few times dry naturally. Everything works different for every one I guess.

reviews.review_title: Does What It Claims To Do
reviews.review_text: I have thick frizzy wavy hair that I usually blow dry and straighten. Some days I wear it naturally. This product does what it claims to do. It leaves a nice shine to my hair when I apply it to my dry hair. It also cuts back on frizz when I apply it to dry hair. A little goes a long way. I'm surprised others who have a similar hair texture says it does not work. I have been really enjoying it since I got it in my Play Box and I will purchase a full size when I run out.
This does absolutely nothing for curly hair with frizz. I assume it would be better for slightly wavy or straight hair with zero frizz.

reviews.review_title: Best Suited for Straight or Wavy Hair
reviews.review_text: I received this item in my April Sephora Play beauty box. Unfortunately this oil is better suited for straight or wavy hair. Not curly hair. It left my hair slightly frizzy, even after a blow dry. I did a blowout and used it on my hair in its natural state. It worked better as a blowout tool, but stll left my hair slightly frizzy. This is better suited to tame flyways use it sparingly of you have curly hair. This hair-care product is fibromyalgia and sensory issues friendly. Just my friendly opinion.

At first it was little skeptical, my hair has been dry scalp. My hair is curly and thinning. The ghost oil has little bit helped my scalp to less dry and smooth. I like it, but my hair keeps falling down. I will use it as rarely when it needs to my dry scalp. I got it from Play Sephora.

I have a dry and itchy scalp that was so out of hand that I had to go to a dermatologist. Nothing that was prescribed to me worked. I reiceved this hair oil in my play box and my itching was GONE. I stopped using it for a few days just to see if it was all in my head but NO ... this product is a miracle. This stopped the itching  - it nourished my scalp. It made my hair super shiny and my hair is even growing back. I cannot tell you how amazing this product is. I'm on my 2nd bottle.
This product was horrible! It didn't control my frizz whatsoever- all it did was make my hair greasy from just a tiny amount. I threw it away.
Got this in my play subscription box. I love this stuff, makes my curly hair smooth and shiny. Will definitely be purchasing.
Ghost Oil is easy on the wallet and makes your locks oh so easy on the eyes! An absolute happy hour for quenched hair. You won't regret this buy!!!

I have coarse/thick/wavy hair. I do not color my hair, in the past I have had keratin treatments but not for almost a year. I received a sample in my PLAY box. The first time I used it I used a drop and it was not enough product to be effective in my hair. The second use I used more product but it just made my hair greasy/oily, Would not repurchase.
I use to have dry, frizzy hair but not since the first time I used this. It has improved my hair and smoothed it so that it's straight hair not wavy.

This is a combo of cyclepentasiloxane and plant oils, and it's great for boosting shine and curl without greasiness. It can be applied to wet or dry hair, but I think it works best if I apply a few drops and comb it through before blow-drying. The result is soft, shiny hair with lots of bounce and curl.  I love the price, too, it's a great value compared to similar products.

I love my Ghost Oil! I was using MoroccanOil but I didn't like the strong scent or the fact that it isn't cruelty free. I ordered Verb's Ghost Oil after some quick research, and it works really well for my hair! It's a light, transparent oil and it has a light fragrance (I would call it a citrus scent but that's not quite right). While I cannot say it repairs my split ends (I have a lot of long hair and I'm always finding them), it never claimed to do that. What it does do is smooth down my frizz and leave a lovely sheen behind. I like to apply it when my hair is damp to dry. Often I will blow-dry my hair, apply the oil midway through, then continue drying it. I always use it before flat ironing my hair, for the extra heat protection. I never apply it near the roots because my scalp tends to get oily there throughout the day, but it's absolute bliss on my long length!

reviews.review_title: tried a sample now in love
reviews.review_text: I got this in my Sephora Play and tried it thinking it would be another oil that weighed down my super fine hair. NO. This is amazing. Even with air drying my hair is so soft and non greasy. I got a big bottle. Loving it.

Wow! An oil that doesn't make my roots oily within a day or 2, first time a product doesn't make that happen. This leaves my hair soft & gives it a nice shine I've also noticed my hair doesn't get as tangle as much as before using this product. I'm just overall impressed that this doesn't get my roots oily fast as that's been my main issue and no need to use dry shampoo!

As an oily haired girl with terribly dry/split ends - finding a good hair oil has been a difficult journey.  Two years ago, I discovered the MorrocanOil Treatment Light oil and fell in love with everything about it... except the cost. I searched high and low trying to find an oil that was comparable that didn't make my hair feel greasy and stringy. It wasn't until I stumbled upon a Buzzfeed article on underrated hair products that I had even heard of Verb's Ghost Oil. It seemed too good to be true, especially at that price point, but I figured it was worth a try. From the consistency to the scent, nothing disappoints me with this oil!  Given that I have oily hair, I don't apply this product directly to my scalp, only to the hair that would be in the tail portion of a pony tail. After application, I blow dry and style as normal.

I received a sample of this in my Playbox. Although, I'm not completely through my sample, I've already purchased the full size bottle in anticipation! First off, the scent is a nice fruity fresh fragrance. But most importantly, it has brought back the ends of my micro-beaded extensions back to life! For the price, this is BETTER than any other serum I've ever used. A MUST TRY for dry hair.

I literally fell in love with this product: great fresh fruity smell, light, not greasy, eliminates all frizzing hair and makes your hair very very soft... I thought that I will just waste my moeny but not at all ! Deff worth of trying! Can not be compared with pharmacy oils .. Highly Recommend!

I have thick wavy hair and it is so hard to find something that is going to make my hair soft and less frizzy without weighing it down but this is the best thing I've used for it! I apply it while my hair is still damp and before I brush it and when my hair dries, the waves are soft and light. My hair also tends to get greasy the next day after I've washed it but I've noticed that with this oil, it doesn't get greasy and I love that!
This oil is exactly what my hair wanted! I use it on my ends every day to keep my waves from looking frizzy/messy and it works perfectly. It smells great and never feels greasy.

I've never met a hair oil I didn't fall in love with.  This is no exception, and inexpensive for the amount.  I got this in my play box in April 2017, and am almost through the sample.  I have extremely dry hair, and this keeps my hair soft for  entire week!  Better than any other oil I've tried (perhaps the exception of pure coconut oil - but I can't stand the smell).

I normally use a spray type of oil for my hair but that just wasn't working to keep it nice and smooth looking. So I saw this and decided to take a chance!  I had oily hair when I was younger so I was extremely nervous to use this at first! I did not want my hair to look like an oil smear!  As I've gotten older it's gotten dryer from heat tools, coloring & other products but based on the other reviews I decided to just go for it.   And it's awesome. I just pump a small amount into my hands, rub them together & run them through my  very thick, long hair & it keeps my hair looking smooth and static free! That's a huge accomplishment for me, lol.  I have a Beachwaver curling iron, and after I'm done curling my hair I use this and my curls look so soft and pretty. It's perfect as the weather is a little crazy so I'll have to wait and see how it holds up I. The summer heat.
I love this, its perfect for my hair

I was skeptical about trying this when I received it in my Play box, but I am extremely happy I did. I have fine, frizzy, dry, color treated hair and usually oils tend to weigh it down, no matter how little I use. Not this! One small pump took care of all of my hair. My hair has never felt so soft, complied with my styling regime so well, or stayed this frizz free. It is shiny, but NOT greasy or dirty looking.   I decided to test this on one of the rare humid days where I live and it performed amazingly well. A little goes a VERY long way, and I'd recommend mainly concentrating on the middle-to-ends of the hair and then just tousling with whatever is left on your fingers/hands. I am going to purchase the full size today. I'm convinced and have found my new holy grail hair product. Highly recommend!
Smells nice, can get greasy. Haven't found the difference between this and $8 drug store oil.

I don't understand how an oil can leave my hair so dried out. Even if I go heavy on it to the point that my hair should be greasy it will look nice at first but with in a few hours my hair feels super dry and looks fried. Got this in my play box and will not purchase a full size

I can't get over the smell of this hair oil! It is such a fresh and fruity smell, that leaves my hair smelling great! A little of this product goes a long way, so I only need 4 or 5 drops of this stuff to calm my curly, frizzy hair. I notice that my hair looks so healthy and shiny after using this, without weighing it down and making it look greasy,

I have tried all of the Oribe products, the Moroccan oil products, Dry Bar products. I was looking for a product that would reduce frizz, increase shine, soften, and no weigh my hair down. Ghost oil is the best oil I have ever used in my hair.   I use it when my hair is damp before I dry it and also right after to seal the ends. For $14 you have to try it. Its a MUST HAVE.

While it did make my hair soft and shiny, it also weighed my hair down making it look a little greasy even when used very sparingly. Tried it on damp hair before styling and on dry hair after styling and the effect was the same either way. I only used HALF of 1 pump.
I absolutely love this product!

reviews.review_title: Can't believe I haven't reviewed this already
reviews.review_text: The only bad thing about this product is that it's loaded with awful silicones, which are notorious for damaging curly hair. Be sure to follow up with a cleansing serum/shampoo/treatment if you plan on using this at all.  That being said, I'm on my third bottle. I'm very picky with hair care, and very skeptical about reviews, so it's uncommon for me to actually like something.  My hair is curly, but as it grows longer they turn into waves, so I have a mix of both. And I have a lot of it. It basically dies when it comes in contact with alcohol, so that makes it hard for me to find hair products that work. I had huge, frizzy, uncontrollable hair before trying this stuff.  Non-greasy. Lightweight. Smells SO good but it is clearly an added fragrance, be wary if you're sensitive to that. Virtually disappears after massaging it into hair. One bottle lasts AGES. One pump does my whole head, but sometimes I go in for another pump if it's really out of control. I'm guilty of keeping this stuff in my bag *just in case*, though I've never had to reapply.
Love this for so many reasons. It's lightweight and left my hair so soft and shiny. But most of all it smells soooooo good

I was skeptical on using this oil I got in my play box. My hair gets oily from a lot of products. But this was a miracle worker. My wavy, thick, dry hair was soft and completely free of frizz! I use 3 drops after my shower and blow dry. It works so well!
Love this. I straighten my hair daily and it really keeps it soft

I have super fine, oily hair, and I usually try to avoid hair oils at all costs. I got a sample of this in my Play box and was planning on giving it away, but I'm so glad I didn't. This tames all of my frizz and makes my hair look so smooth and shiny without feeling at all greasy. I'm still to afraid to use it near my roots, but a little bit on the ends works wonders. I went to buy to full size and was so happily surprised when I saw the price!
This product made my hair look so greasy and I barely even used any (kind of tested the water) it had a strange smell and was over all displeased

I can't stand the feel of hair products that contain silicones. They make my hair feel smooth and look shiny initially, but they tend to build up create an unmanageable texture after a few weeks. This product was difficult to wash off my hands (I couldn't stand the feeling of it on my palms) so I'd imagine it could be difficult to get out of your hair.
Made my hair so smooth and shiny.  Not greasy at all just soft.  Will definitely buy the full size.
Surprisingly it makes my hair smooth,shiny and manageable instantly.Tried so so many other Sephora brands but non of them worked like this.

I have very oily and frizzy hair and any type of serum or oil I've ever used has just turned my hair into more of a greasy mess but I LOVE this serum! I got it in my play box and was actually going to give it away but instead I'll be buying the full sized product. It helps with my frizz and makes my hair look so smooth and shiny! Must have!

This stuff smells amazing! very fresh, clean, and light scent that is not very overpowering and strong.  it moths and softens very well and is light weight.  i have thick, wavy hair and it works really well. the best part of this oil is that it is not so greasy it makes your hair look dirty and very oily like some hair oils.  it just adds a nice natural shine. it has a great price for the amount of product you get too!

I received this in my March Play box and was skeptical.  I have long, dry, thick, wavy hair that gets a lot of wind and sun damage from riding on my motorcycle.  I have tried many hair oils throughout the years, and many of them left my hair oily, or gave me acne on my neck and lower face.  I thought I already had the holy grail with the hair oil I was using and then I sampled this.  It tames my waves without weighting them down, doesn't make my hair oily, gives my hair great shine, and doesn't give me acne.  My husband even commented that my hair is looking great after using this for the 2nd time!  The ONLY downside to this is that my previous hair oil smelled like heaven, this has zero smell.  However, I'll take amazing hair that doesn't smell like anything over oily hair that gives me acne but smells great ANY DAY!  I bought the full size already.

reviews.review_title: best hair oil in the market!
reviews.review_text: I got this on my sephora play box and was skeptical at first. With curly and frizzy hair, I've tried so many oils to avoid frizz and to make my hair softer and NONE, no drugstore or high end expensive oil has worked like this one. I tried it once and everyone, even my boyfriend, noticed my hair looking shinier and better. I live in Miami where there's a lot of humidity and this product works great without being too greasy. GO FOR IT!

This oil worked so well that I immediately bought the $14 full sized bottle. It makes my hair (thin, blonde and oily) and my daughter's (brown, thick & course, dry) look equally amazing. Even my son wanted to use it! It's also awesome smelling- a great, light citrusy scent and a little goes a long way.

I received this in my Sephora Play box and it is a must have for my curly hair.  I have fine spiral curls and I am very particular about anything I add to my hair routine . This is a light oil that recovers frizz and helps keep my curls coiled and frizz free and you need so little .. ordered the full size and decided to try other items in the line .

I AM SO OBSESSED!!! After receiving this in my Play Box, I have fallen in love with it. Went ahead and purchased the full size, I mean 14$, it's affordable and does exactly what it says its gonna do!! I have frizzy wavy/curly hair and this leaves me hair soft and smooth. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. I even got my mom hooked.

I've used so many oils in an effort to tame my bleached hair frizz and flyaways. I also can very easily get oil overload and look greasy.  THIS.IS.PERFECT.  It's clear so it doesn't stain platinum hair but it's also effective at taming frizz.  My play sample tipped over on my vanity and so one thing I'd say is be careful to close the top; Its a thinner oil so it drained out of the pkging.
This stuff is amazing! It literally absorbs into your hair immediately, and does not leave a greasy feeling. It smooths out my ends and tames my hairstyle through humidity and rain.

I love this stuff! I have straight hair with slight wave to it but it tangles very easily and is kinda frizzy, when I put this stuff in my hair it is so smooth and soft! I put a few drops in my hands and work it through hair when it's damp. I totally recommend this, it works wonders!!

I recently got a mini Ghost Oil in my March Sephora Play! box. I've been using MoroccanOil for years and I think this is better (and it's way cheaper!). I use it on damp hair before blowdrying, and I use it on my dry ends when I've finished blowdrying. It has a subtle, nice scent as well. Would recommend for anyone looking to improve heat damage to their hair!

For only $14, this product is lightweight, nourishing, and helps my dry and thirsty hair looking healthy and shining! My hair is naturally is oily so I hesitated to purchased this oil, but I bought it anyway because I need an oil to nourish my damaged hair and OMG! This works like a charm!   The smell is perfect; not too much fragrance but just a sweet gentle scent. I applied the oil on my damp hair and again after blow drying. I also use the excess oil on my hand and it helps my hand feeling soft. Totally recommended for everyone.

I got remy hair extensions on my hair and after washing it a couple of times with no sulfate shampoo and drowning them in rich conditioners the hair is still dry, so I was searching for leave in conditioners or hair oils that I can spritz on throughout the day as I brush it etc...  So I saw so many good reviews on this oil and decided to give it a try.  It smells great and works wonders!  Before my hair extensions are dry and frizzy, so it makes me look like I had a LOT of hair...after rubbing the oil in the extensions, it calmed down a lot and doesn't look dry anymore! Mind you I didn't expect it to make it look silly and shiny but at least it didn't look dry anymore and that's all I asked for.  Maybe I can put more for shine maybe I'll try that later

reviews.review_title: This works for thin fine hair
reviews.review_text: I have really thin fine hair and when I received this in my play box I was thinking no way oil and my hair don,t mix .But I love this it does not make my hair oily great for morning fuzzy hair

My hair is thin really thin and dry but oily scalp. Most hair oils either make my hair to greasy or don't do anything for me. I was extremely surprised at this product received it in my sephora play yesssssss it's so good. My hair looks good even air dried.

I don't usually use hair oil, but I had received this one In my March Playbox from Sephora and I decided to give it a try. This product does everything that it says it will do. It has a lovely, light fragrance that quickly dissipates. I was worried that it would make my hair oily or greasy, but it just moisturized my hair. This ghost oil also tamed frizz and fly-aways. A little goes a long way. I highly recommend this product.

I received this in my March Play! box and I was skeptical at first, but so glad I tried this.  It made my hair so shiny (something that I have been lacking lately) and healthy looking.  I have dry, thick hair and this made my hair smell wonderful and was almost weightless.  It left no greasy residue on my hands.  Also, the sample I received was a nice size, so good job on that Verb.
Loved this sample in my playbox! Smells amazing! Isn't heavy! Used it on damp and dry hair, my hair felt so polished! Will most likely be purchasing in future!
I got this in my March PLAY! box and I was pleasantly surprised as to how non greasy and light of a formula this was. Definitely a new staple in my haircare routine.

(if you can even call it an oil) It's hard to find an oil product that doesn't leave your hair greasy looking.. I use this everyday whether i'm leaving my hair scrunched (Ghost Oil and DevaCurl SuperCream Coconut Curl) or when I  blow/straighten my hair, it leaves a soft smooth frizzless finish. I don't think I will ever go without this!

reviews.review_title: I will never be with out this product!
reviews.review_text: My whole life I've struggled with dry , thick curly hair , now in my late 30's it's color treated on top of it , I have spent a fortune on hair products to soften and tame dryness and frizz , this wonderful product came in my play box , used the sample and ordered a full size asap ! My hair has never felt so soft and shiny, I use on wet hair and if needed Finnish my ends after drying and styling, I can even straighten my hair at home if I like ( witch has never gone well in the past ) so happy with this product, and can't wait to try other products in this line ! !
I like the consistency and the smell is light. It seems like a little goes a long way.

I have a daughter with thick, curly, dry hair. I have used this on her several times and it does not leave her hair any softer or with better texture than the Argan oil I buy at the drugstore for half the price of this. Not worth the money for us.

I received this oil in my March Play Box and it is excellent for my 3a/3b, thick curly hair. This oil removes frizz and also helps define my curls in combination with a leave in conditioner and a gel. I would highly recommend this for people who have curly frizzy hair!
I love this product. Leaves my hair feeling super silky and soft. Works on both wet and dry hair. Doesn't make hair look oily. Will repurchase once I run out.

I received this in my Play box. I am so impressed by this product! I couldn't wait to try it, so I put a small amount in my hair as soon as I saw it the box. My hair immediately looked shiny and healthier than ever. I've worked with dozens of serums, oils, and other leave-ins. This is incredible. It doesn't weigh my hair down either. Great product!!!

I happened to stumble upon this product while I was looking for hair care items. I was a little weary because I had bad experiences with other serums; leaving my hair flat, lanky, oily. This product does not do that. It leaves my hair so silky and smooth. Not a tangle in sight or greasiness. Even when I feel like I put too much it still looks and feels so good. It is well priced considering a few drops really go a long way. A 60 ml bottle will definitely last a couple months if not more. I will for surely by this product again! (When I finally run out)
Made my hair crazy soft without being oily. Great for thin hair.
Got the ghost oil in my play bag and its absolutely perfect! Smells amazing and works wonders with my frizzy and curly coarse hair.
I got this in my playbox luckily, and it's amazing. My hair looks so nice after I put it in and leaves it so smooth afterwards. Im not crazy about oils but I'm now obsessed with this product!
thought this wasn't doing anything and i was very disappointed... and then i woke up the next morning and my hair was softer than ive ever felt it before. this is life changing.

First off this stuff smells so good!! I also love that it's like a dry oil and doesn't leave your hair feeling or looking greasy, which some you sometimes get with heavier oils. It soaked right into my hair so no greasy residue just a nice shiny healthy look. Also I have thin hair so a lot of products just make my hair look stringy but this one is my new go to!

I had no real expectations going into trying this oil.  I've tried various varieties of serums and glosses. I usually use castor oil when I set my 3A/3B curls but since this came in my Play box, I decided to give it a whirl.  WOW!  I applied it to my damp hair and realized pretty quickly how shiny it made my hair.  I'm in day two of my style and my hair is still soft.  I have quite a bit of hair and two quarter-sized dollops was enough to coat my hair.  I had planned to purchase the Moroccan Oil but I think this will put that off at least another six months.  Curious to see how this would work on my hair when it's straightened.

I received this product in my play box. I was skeptical about it but it works! I have been using my sample daily and my hair is smooth, shiny, and healthier. The only downfall is that it causes my curls to smooth out for some reason. It causes my curls to flatten into waves. It's not bad, but it's not a product I can use when I want pronounced curls. I am purchasing this product.

I received in My Play by Sephora Box and OMG its fantastic!! My hair was really dry after a day of running around I put some of this through my hair and it left it soooo soft and shinnyl. I already put a full size in my cart a definite purchase for me.

I got this in my Sephora play box and loved it with just one use! It made my hair SO UNBELIEVABLY SOFT and you can use it on dry hair as well. I was pleasantly surprised when I saw the price of the full size. I'll definitely be buying!

I have very fine hair that loves to soak up other hair oils like crazy, making me look like I never wash my hair after only a few hours post-application. Verb Ghost oil was the first product that never left behind oily roots, weighed down strands, or flat looking hair. Definitely a must have for fine hair!!
Great product. Works wonderful!!

I have damaged over treated hair. I use this after washing my hair and it leaves my hair nice, shiny, and healthy looking. Don't use to much or it will weigh your hair down and make it look greasy. Overall I'm a fan!
And good sample size. No smell really, very light and not oily. Loving this new brand

I got this in my play box and I am shocked!!! The sample they gave was giant compared to others, would probably last at least two weeks with two drips a day every day. Regardless, the full size isn't expensive at all and I will 100% be buying. The top layer of my hair is fine and limpish but the bottom is thick, frizzy, and always tangled. My hair always looks dull. I wash my hair at night and put this in, and my hair stays soft allllll day the next day with minimal tangles. It feels like salon hair all day, which no product has ever ever done for me. This changed my hair 100% and I am obsessed.

Like others, I got this as a PLAY! sample this month.  I have a lot of fine, wavy hair, and was at first wary that the product would weigh it down, But I've been using it daily this week and my hair feels softer, smoother, and lighter than usual without any extra oily feeling. The scent is pleasant but not overbearing, and a little goes a long way with this stuff.  Will definitely purchase the full size for such a reasonable price!

Received this in my Ipsy bag but then I used all of it and I was considering buying the full size, but then I saw that I received it in my Sephora play bag. I love this stuff, makes my hair feel super soft and easy to brush through. Super light weight so it doesn't weight down my hair. i also have damage ends that are dry, brittle-y and this helped so much. so glad it was sent to me in my Sephora play bag.
I fell in love with this right away. It made my hair super soft without weighing it down or greasy.

I received this in my Play! Box and I've been using it almost every day since. It keeps my hair super soft and keeps most of the frizz down (I only use 2-3 drops so that might be why I haven't gotten rid of the frizz completely?) A little definitely goes a long way, though I'll definitely be buying a full size very soon!

I received this in my March playbox and it is truly one of the best serums. It also smells delicious. I am transitioning and this helped out my blow drying and flat ironing process. I will be buying a bigger bottle.

My hair is coarse, dry, and frizzy. I've tried so many oils, serums, anything I could and nothing ever helped. Now I get keratin treatments every few months, because it's the only way to control my hair. I'm currently due for keratin, so my hair is not in good shape. I received this Ghost Oil in my Play box, and didn't expect much. I just tried it for the first time, 2 drops on damp hair, then dried. I am absolutely amazed with how well it worked. My hair looks and feels as if I just had a keratin treatment. Frizz free, so soft and smooth and shiny. It will take a few more tries to convince me that it's a keeper, but after my first use, I am very impressed.

I received the small sample size bottle in the March play box and immediately fell in love. It lets me keep the perfect beachy texture I love with the healthy shine I always want. I twist and scrunch it through when it's dry and wavy as a finishing touch of shine and to tame flyaways. It's literally a holy grail product for me to have the hair texture and health I love!

This made my hair look great on initial application, but after a day spent wearing it it almost felt like I'd fried my hair under a magnifying glass. Also contains silicones that need to be washed out with a harsher shampoo than my curly hair prefers. Not a win.
Helps with my frizz and smells lovely.

reviews.review_title: I don't know how I lived without it!
reviews.review_text: Truly the best hair care product I have ever had! I have fine, oily hair that when I normally used any kind of oil would make my hair go flat or look greasy. I got this in a ipsy bag and fell in love with it. I have never gotten so many compliments on my hair. My boyfriend loves how soft my hair is now and I do too. Seriously don't know how I used any other product before this. The girl who checked me out at Sephora and I had a bonding moment over this ghost oil. It lasts forever and the only thing I would change is have it came in travel size.
Awesome doesn't make my hair greasy at all!! keeps my hair so smooth I love this!

This showed up in my March Play Box, and it was by far the product I fell in love with most. It has a nice, lightweight texture to it and works wonder at taming my flyaways while leaving hair smooth and silky. I will definitely be picking up a full-size bottle!

Another verb product that he steals from me,after I got my first Verb product from Sephora Play he got it for styling his hair. Oh my hubby isn't vain at all,has straight short hair,but as he had to start to blow dry for health reasons (recorent tonsillitis)need a product. Because verb it's a great product light natural and I guess very neutral, appealing ,clean design try on your hubbies they will get hooked and then u buy other things for yourself on Sephora when order for them haha
I received this in my March Play box and LOVE it!!  It smells good, doesn't leave my hair greasy at all.  It works great whether my hair is wet or dry.
I received this in my Sephora play box and I love it. It's very light weight and great for frizzy hair. Need to get the full size.
I got this in the March playboy. It makes my hair so soft and shiny. Perfect solution for my heat damaged hair. Will definitely purchase the full size!

I love this hair oil! I got a good sized sample in my playbox and it's great! I just put about two to three drops in my hand and rub them together then run my hands through my hair from root to ends then blow dry. It protects my hair from the heat of the blow dryer and also makes my hair really soft and shiny.

I received this in my March Sephora Play box. I have very coarse and dry hair. I straighten my hair which makes it worse. This oil is amazing!! Makes my hair so soft and shiny. I will purchase the full size.

This oil is amazing for my hair. I have dyed my hair alot and it's very dry and damaged now. This oil made my hair look so much more healthy. It gives it a shine that is has been lacking for months now.
Got it in my Play box, best thing this month! My hair feels soft, detangled and just amazing, while not being greasy or weighed down. Just the best!

I received this as a sample in a subscription box.  I didn't think I would like it so I waited a while before I ever tested it.  I have thick hair that is quite curly if I diffuse it.  When I use this my hair is awesome.  I live in South Florida with year round humidity.  This takes away all the frizz and is not greasy at all on my hair.  I like this more than my Moroccan oil  My hair is so soft and straight but still has body.  Day 2 my hair still looks great.  I love this stuff.  I will definitely be buying the larger size!

I love this. I have also purchased the morocan oil light treatment and they are equally amazing for the price i recomend the verb. Leavez hair so smooth and tangle free. if you have damaged hair and need something to help dry ends this is for you

All it does is sit in the bottom of my cupboard. Bought this product after reading the rave reviews. I've used MoroccanOil before and this could not compare. It was not lightweight and for someone with thin hair it really weighed everything down all day! I tried just using it on my ends, but it didn't seem to make anything smoother or softer. I think I'll stick to my other oil treatments and won't be using this product again!

This stuff is amazing! I have fine, straight hair. I have tried SO MANY different oils, from the cheap drugstore brands to the super pricey salon elixirs. They either leave my hair oily and weighed down, or super dry with tons of fly-aways. Then I tried VERB and it all changed. My hair is soft, full, not greasy, and no fly-aways. And I feel good because VERB is cruelty-free. Plus, the price is modest compared to the salon brands. Give it a try - you won't be disappointed.

My hair dresser told me my hair was super dry and that I should start doing regular hair masks and look for a product to hydrate my hair (She recommended and Oribe product that was $$$).   I read the reviews for this product and decided to give it a shot. Honestly, I thought I would be returning it within a few days but I am shocked at how healthy it makes my hair look! I'm a teacher and even some of my student noticed that something was different! My hair is less frizzy and my curls are more defined. Definitely good for dry and damaged hair!

I bought this on a whim after reading it's reviews and I'm still a little on the fence. The product smells great, a light citrusy smell IMO, and it makes running my fingers through my hair a dream. I do not find it does anything for the frizz at the top of my head, but it keeps everything below shining and smooth. Not heavy at all, and is definitely fine for daily use ( I do have think hair though) as it doesn't weigh down. Not a bad price for how much use is in one bottle, but I don't know if I'd repurchase right away yet.

I really love this oil. I have greasy roots and dry ends. I just put the tiniest amount in my hands and work through my ends. This product smells great and it's not heavy at all. It really tames the frizz and makes hair feel silky smooth!

I have fine, thin and flat hair, so to use any kind of oil on it is not something I do lightly.  This oil did not weigh my hair down at all, it left my hair shiny and smooth, just what I was looking for.

What a crazy fantastic product. I cannot stop touching my hair and playing with it it is so silky soft and voluminous now. Never cared about touching it before! I bought this without trying it because I had given up on my long hair, I burnt it a couple of weeks ago with a curler. I will definitely will become a permanent user of this. And it seems it will last forever, just use a few drops after each wash. Squee.

My hair has been super frizzy lately and nothing works.  I have used Aveda, Moroccan Oil and others and they just stopped working in the humid climate I live in, but the ghost oil really does the trick.  My hair feels silky and smooth, and no frizz!

I'm in love with this oil. It's been perfection for my hair (thin strands, big volume, blonde, daily heat styling, oily near the scalp and dry towards the ends). Since my strands are thin, oils tend to make my hair very oily, making it look like I haven't showered in a week or two – one of the issues with Bumble&Bumble's Invisible Oil.  Verb makes my hair sooo soft and a little bit shiny (albeit not as shiny as Invisible Oil) and it's become a standard part of my routine. I also love how a little goes a long way and the price point is great.

OMG love the way it transformed my hair. I thought I loved the Ouai oil till I tried this. While the Ouai smells amazing and lighter in consistency. Ghost oil is a tad bit thicker, smells ok(clean scent) but the results it gives me are fabulous. Instantly transformed my hair, this is no joke!!! This oil gives me volume and makes my hair soft and shiny. Though this oil is thicker in consistency it doesn't make my fine hair greasy.

i received a sample of this in my ipsy bag and omg am i obsessed. i use it every time i get out of the shower and it leaves my hair feeling soft up to 2-3 days. the best part is it doesn't leave it oily! i can't wait to purchase the full sized bottle later this week
I use this product 2-3 squirts on wet hair after shower, and 1-2 when dry before using the hot iron. It makes my blonde hair so shiny without looking greasy at all. I would recommend this 100%!
The only oil I can apply to my roots with no grease. Keeps volume and helps with keeping my ends hydrated.
I have long hair that is thick but can be coarse and frizzy. This stuff works great. Feels super light smooths hair down (no real hold but works great for fly away) and doesn't leave any residue

This hair oil is amazing! It doesn't make your hair look greasy at all. I notice a major difference in the softness of my hair after using it. I apply a little bit to my damp hair and when it's dry it looks amazing.
This is great for my hair if I forget to wrap it at night and great at detangling my ends when I am combing through wet hair.

I have very fine, blond hair that gets weighed down very easily. With this oil, my hair never feels greasy or heavy, just hydrated and sleek. The smell is great, and a little goes a long way. Will definitely buy again!

Bought this a few days ago for the first time. Applied it before blow-drying and my hair is very soft and frizz-free! Also can apply on dry hair for some extra softness! I have fairly oily hair to begin with so I used about 1.5 pumps of the oil instead of 2-3 and focused on applying it mid-way down my hair to the ends staying away from my roots. Will buy this again :)
Literally love this product! this is my 3rd time purchasing it! i definitely notice a difference in my hair when i stop using it. makes my hair so smooth and definitely helps my split ends

I NEVER write reviews! But, I LOVE this oil so much I am writing my first beauty review. I have long, thick, course, curly, color treated hair. It tends to have a mind of its own  and frizz up at a moments notice. I have truly tried almost every conditioning, anti-frizz product. And, this is by far the best product I have found! I am so glad it is cruelty free and without sulfates etc. I am so glad I bought this finally.  And, if you haven't yet...I highly recommend it.

My sis gave this to me out of her ipsy bag & this is amazing!!! Will be buying more ASAP! Doesn't make my hair look greasy or oily, it's light weight and my hair is shiny after I apply to my damp hair & let air dry

I have extremely thin and fine hair. I do use heat on my hair often and I find that this product not only protects it from heat but also tames and smooths. It's really lightweight, and I find that half a pump is plenty for me.
My hair is all bleach damaged and this oil makes my hair feel super soft. It has a light scent which is nice, and for my thin hair I only need one pump. I'll definitely buy this again.

I have very very thick hair that has been through it's fair share of bleaching and dying. This oil not only keeps my hair soft and smooth, but gets rid of frizz and keeps it straight after blow drying!

Got this as a sample in my Ipsy bag. Wonderfully hydrating and as everyone is saying, it's thicker like a serum (I would compare it to BioSilk consistency). I put it on while my hair is wet and it keeps my hair soft and shiny all day. For reference I have thin, frizzy, curly (3A/3b) hair.

Got a sample in an Ipsy bag and I knew I needed to get a full size after the first use! It is the first oil product to really soften my hair and tame flyways. It smells amazing, strengthens my ends, and it doesn't break the bank! New staple hair care product

I LOVE this oil!   I originally started with a sample and had to go back for more. Not to mention it's at an affordable cost and does an amazing job at mending your split ends, making your hair beautifully shiny, and so so soft!
Got this as a gift and it's terrific! I have to say, this really does leave the hair baby soft and hydrated
