Not greasy and my hair soaks it up so quickly! perfect for taming fly aways after styling or if you have really dry hair.

So glad Sephora is carrying Verb. I put Ghost Oil on my hair before drying, and it's made a big difference with my dry and brittle hair. I like how there's no sticky or oily feeling after my hair is dry.
Love the smell...and the oil makes my hair shiny and soft.
It's a good hairoil and doesn't feel sticky on my hands after applying. I combine it with my caviar cc cream.
I love this product! I have issues with dry and frizzy hair-this oil is amazing. I want to try the other Verb products as well. Reasonable price point.

reviews.review_title: More silicone than oil, but very nice
reviews.review_text: This is more of a silicone-y serum than a nourishing oil, but I did know that going in since I read the ingredients. Silicone is a humectant (prevents moisture loss) so I like to use this on my ends after washing while my hair is still damp, though I do use it on dry hair, too. It gives beautiful sheen and slip and I think it will help to prevent breakage and split ends with continued use. The fresh scent is subtle but long-lasting. My boyfriend even commented on the nice smell which I don't think he's ever done! One pump is enough for my just past shoulder-length hair so the bottle will definitely last a while. My hair is medium-thick and straight/wavy but I'm sure this would be great for any hair type.

This is my favorite now! I have damaged hair from coloring and my hair is long to the waist. So my tips got dry even after cutting. This product will shine it up instantly. A little will go a long way. I rub it in my hands and then apply iy. For my long hair 2 pumps are more then enough! This also helps with tangles. Love it!
This product does smooth your hair and make it feel soft. However, I don't think it adds moisture and even using a little bit I feel like it leaves a little residue on the hair.

reviews.review_title: Tames my Natural Hair After Straightening
reviews.review_text: I like this product but it is definitely a serum, not an oil. Very lightweight, I ran this through my freshly straightened 4A hair and it reduced any frizz/puffiness. I also applied a small amount to my hair before blow drying because it says it works as a heat protectant on damp hair. I love this product because I can keep reapplying and my hair absorbs it. It doesn't sit on top of the hair weighing it down or making it look greasy! I find it helps control and smooth the hair as well. One thing is that I have tried many drug store serums and high end serums. They all give me similar results but this one has a very nice subtle scent and is worth trying.

Before using this, my hair was extremely damaged.. as in, time for a haircut damaged. My ends were frazzled, and still need a trim, but after bleaching and dying, and dying, and dying, I didn't think anything short of a chop would help it recover.  I went with a very dark dye to go into heal the hair mode and picked the Ghost Oil up for shine. I have shoulder length hair. I put two pumps on towel-dry hair, then air dry, then one more pump on dry hair and wow.. my hair looks 90% back to normal again! No frizz, no flyaways, just sleek and shiny after ONE use.   I chose this because it's cruelty-free and made in Austin. I didn't have high hopes at first because of how damaged my hair is to begin with, but now I'm truly impressed.

I love this oil. I have bleached my hair to the point where its very dry. its not too broken but very dry. I used this only a few times but im in love with it. I use 3-4 drops for my medium thin hair and it is so lightweight and hydrating. I cant believe the difference in my hair. I use the Moroccan oil hair mask twice a week and this almost daily, My hair is so soft and touchable, I could not be happier with this product.

I bought this because I've seen a few bloggers use it and I need a new hair oil, so I figured why not. My hair is naturally very wavy and frizz prone, and I live in the PNW so my hair is usually just in a bun from October to May. I've been using this a few weeks and not only does my hair barely need flat iron touch ups, but it stays straight and so soft for days. This especially helps control all the baby fine hair around my face and neck without weighing it down and feeling oily. This is defiantly a holy grail.

I have very long hair and it's very thick. After I straighten my hair I but this oil on. It truly makes me hair look shiny and not so frizzy. A little goes along way ladies! Just half a pump is what I regularly use.

I really like this product, wonderful fragrance! I have lots and lots of very fine hair and this product does a really good job of moisturizing without weighing by hair down! Ive used it on both wet and dry hair and it absorbs with both.

Gloss more than an actual oil! I've used a lot of hair serums that are just as good as Verb's Ghost Oil so I'm not completely blown out of the water with this product. I took it with me on a recent travel trip though & it worked just as well as Bumble & Bumble's Hairdresser oil but at home, I find myself needing more of an oilier serum consistency as this is really a heavy gloss which leaves a shiny residue.

I love this stuff! The scent of it is not my favorite, but it still smells pretty good (I like fruitier stuff!)  I put this in my hair after I shower (2-4 pumps bc my hair sucks up moisture) and let my hair dry & then if I use any heat product on my hair I use another pump.  My hair is color treated, it was bleached to death so keeping color in my hair isn't as easy right now. My hair is also thick & naturally curly (although it hates to curl when it's above my shoulders)  I put this in my hair when it was wet, went to sleep (which I normally don't sleep on damp hair) and I woke up and my hair was so curly!! But it wasn't frizzy or anything.

It hasn't helped with my curls but I will honestly say to use this when your hair is damp-slightly dry for BEST results! It helps with frizz once you straighten your hair and makes it smooth and my hair is not oily at all!!

I love this oil.  I actually use it as a detangler when I get out of the shower, then I come through my hair & head to bed. In the morning, my hair is so soft & so easy to mange. No frizz. I have medium length, thin curly hair. It's a great product for my hair type.

I'm confused how this product has such good reviews. It genuinely does absolutely nothing for my hair. I use 2-3 pumps in my hair; I have bleached, thick but also fine hair. I walk around with a halo of frizz around my head all day. It doesn't make my hair softer than if I used nothing at all. I mean you can buy this if you're looking for a product to do basically nothing.
Omg. How does this stuff work with just one drop? I have thick, coarse, long hair that often gets frizzy. I smoothed this on to the ends after blow drying (just one drop!) and bam! Perfection.

This product is amazing! I have thin/fine hair that is very frizzy. I use two (2) pumps every morning after my shower and let my hair air dry.  It makes my hair super soft with no frizz. I have tried other hair oils like Moroccan and Argon oils, but nothing worked as well as Verb! I will definitely be buying this product again!
This oil didn't make my hair greasy at all. It made it soft and it air dried beautifully. For the amount you are getting, it will last you a long time!
Great, great  product.  Light, no greasy or heavy like other hair oils, doesn't weigh hair down.  Light, inoffensive, floral scent that doesn't linger.

I've used a couple other hair oils, like morrocan oil and amika oil, and this one is my favourite. I have thick and puffy hair but no frizz, and this product is perfect. It is really light on the hair, smells amazing, and makes the hair super soft! Buying this again for sure!

reviews.review_title: Heavy, but just right for me
reviews.review_text: I love this! Was nervous about paying that much for such a little bottle, but it's worth it. This is supposed to be  used as a heat-prep for styling, but I don't use much heat on my hair. I use it as a anti-frizz oil and it works wonders. On good weather days, it's the only product I put in my hair other than detangling spray. With that being said, USE SPARINGLY! This is a very heavy product. I have waves and ringlets with my length just below my collarbone. I use 1 pump, then a half-pump for touchups. I'm sure it works great with heat styling, I just haven't had the opportunity to use it as such yet.
this oil is great for taming frizz and poof. I have wavy, long, normal, frizzy hair and this oil makes it tame and shiny.

reviews.review_title: Best finishing product I have ever used.
reviews.review_text: I have thick, wavy hair that often needs helps with shine or taming flyaways- this product does exactly that.  I use it when I straighten my hair to give it shine and that Fresh from the salon look. I also use this after I use a wand with loose waves to separate my curls and give definition. I love it so much, I keep it in my purse at all times. It is also great when you wear your hair up to smooth baby hairs. Light weight and amazing. I would recommend. This has replaced all of my other oils, including Moroccan and Living Proof hair oil.
I thought this stuff would do what everyone claimed, and tame my frizz. It didn't. It only made my frizz shiny....

I love this oil. It can be used on wet hair after washing or on dry hair to tame frizz. I have very thick hair and I only need a couple pumps to get the job done.  It's one of the only hair oils I've used that's not sticky and tames frizz without and residue left in your hair.  Considering the price point compared to a lot of other hair oils on the market, I definitely recommend!

This hair oil/serum is so great! It keeps my hair from getting frizzy and keeps it soft. I've tried so many products but nothing works as great as Ghost Oil does. The oil never overgreases my hair, so it always looks shiny in a healthy way.  Also this product doesn't leave any build up, which is great if you don't wash your hair everyday.

I am a huge fan of verb products! I haven't had long hair since i was a little girl, so trying to grow it out again has been a chore. When I ordered this Ghost oil I was skeptical, because other oils I've tried left my hair messy. However this product is simply amazing. A small amount takes care of frizz no problem, and  leaves my hair shiny and SO SOFT! This ghost oil doesn't weigh down my hair, or make me feel like I need to shower. Just flawless shine and healthy hair!

I bought this product thinking it was just another $14 I would spend and it would be average just like all the other oils I have purchased for my dry hair. This is the most amazing product ever!! I applied it after blowing my hair dry and then I used my curling iron like I do every day. MY HAIR FEELS LIKE SILK AND LOOKS LIKE IT!!! I cant believe how incredible this product is. My hair is damaged from hi-lights every 3 months and using a blow dryer and curling iron just about 365 days a year! For me, ghost oil is actually magic oil!!! It's worth the $14, I'd pay double that for this miracle product!!

This hair oil is just so good! It's has a different consistency from most.. it's a bit thicker than other oils, however, it does not weigh your hair down what so ever. It leaves your hair feeling so silky and soft, my curls/waves actually stay in place, and it look just as beautiful from first to last wash! By far the best oil I've used, and you cannot beat the price! Well done VERB!
This is quite different from typical oil formula. very lightweight so doesn't make my hair get greasy(even root part of my hair) but I don't feel any kind of dramatic change. so just good

I went from brunette to blonde over the past year and it has caused my hair some pretty hefty damage.  I have used hair oils for years and can't seem to find one that doesn't weigh my hair down and give it that flat look after I'm done styling it.  I have to say, this one has come pretty close to what I'm looking for. It's great to put in my hair when I'm about to blow-dry it, and i add a pump here in there on the following days when my hair feels dry again.  Not my holy-grail just yet, but it does the job and doesn't feel greasy at all.

I have really high expectations & have tried them all bumble, phyto, no frizz. The best way to use this is on damp hair to blow dry or as a leave in for curls to help with frizz. I wanted it to be a finisher too but its a bit too thick.
It's lightweight. It doesn't leave oily residue. It tames and softens my hair.
Love this oil! Doesn't make my hair look gross or oily, just healthy!

Was looking for an oil that would not weigh down my hair. I did a permanent straightening treatment so was looking for something that would not further the deadness lol.. I use it right after I wash my hair (wet hair). It really seems as if I did not put any oil in it. Don't know how this is possible but def worth it. My hair looks pretty good using this.

Got this as a sample and I didn't have high hopes. Boy was I wrong. I've used Bb hairdresser's oil and this is So. Much. Better. I put 3 drops of this on my damp hair before bed last night, after using Verb shampoo and conditioner and I woke up with soft, frizz free, beachy waves. The search is over for a hair oil, this is it for me. Thank you Verb!!
The smell and consistency are nice, but I find the recommended 2-3 drops to be excessive. Even one pump of the oil makes my thick hair look somewhat greasy and does little to combat my frizz.

I use this oil daily just on the ends of my hair and to control any frizz that pops up. The product is thick which makes it easy to work with. My hair is naturally oily so I was worried that this product would look out of control oily, but it doesn't seem to be an issue. I would buy this again.

I have used so many products to flatten my frizzy hair and finally found the one! This oil is magical.. I use it after towel drying my hair and then blow dry it and can't explain how it makes my hair super soft and shiny and my hair stays like that for the rest of the day!
Makes my hair look so shiny and healthy! I received comments right away. Especially useful as a heat protectant before blow drying or straightening

reviews.review_title: this is silicone gel, not really an oil
reviews.review_text: Now I know why it's called ghost oil, not really an oil. It's silicone gel, does indeed flatten frizz as all silicone products do, silicone is very effective at that.  But this isn't an oil, not moisturizing and if you do not use sulfate shampoo, your hair will suffer from build up and become very dull, if you color or highlight your hair, the clarifying shampoo you will need to use to remove the build up will dull your color horribly.  If you want an oil for your hair, I suggest dry remedy oil.

reviews.review_title: Best Oil at any price point
reviews.review_text: Just ordered a few Verb products, including Ghost Oil. Love how silky and soft it makes my hair feel. One drop does it for my long hair. Smells great, little thick, but I rubbed it all over my hands for a couple seconds and it was easy to apply. Great smell, very happy with this!
This stuff smells amazing and doesn't make my hair staticky like some dry oils will, it is also very hard to go overboard! the oil soaks right up and leaves my hair soft and tangle free!

I am nearly out of this oil and must say I really enjoyed it. This product is lightweight, but also nourishing for my hair. It works well if I plan to straighten or curl my hair and does not weigh it down  or make it look oily (I only use the product on bottom half of hair). That being said, I am giving 4 stars because I did not notice any extra shine and there is one other hair oil I prefer.

I just got this stuff in the mail today. Of course I had to use it immediately. It was raininy and humid here today so my naturally straight hair was relatively frizzy. I took two pumps of this, I massaged one pump at a time into my hair, and immediately it made my hair feel sleek, soft, and completely de-frizzed. In a matter of seconds. I'm extremely impressed and I've only used this stuff once. I can't wait to work this into my daily routine.

I bought this item on a recommendation from an article and I don't know what I did without it.  I have naturally wavy, thin hair (a ton of it) that has a tendency to get a bit frizzy, mostly due to texture and color processing. I have been searching for a finishing product that will provide me with the smooth, shiny hair I've lusted after *without* weighing my hair down (the bigger the hair, the better in my mind).   This is that product!  It truly provides a great shine and sheen without any weight or greasiness. I do apply a small amount and then add in more as needed, as not to overwhelm my hair.  It truly is a little miracle worker and I use it every day.

I have tried everything to get my frizz under control, including Josie Maran's Argan oil, which I do like, but nothing holds a candle to Ghost Oil.  My hair always looks great!  Plus, it smells great and you can massage any excess into your hands for moisturizer.

I recently went back to platinum blonde. I'm naturally pretty dark brown (level 6, I believe). As you can imagine I'm having to baby my hair a lot. I use 1.5 pumps on my wet hair, dry using cold air on the dryer and apply 1/2 a pump to my ends every day until I wash it again. It does not weigh my hair down at all. It makes it shiny and manageable. Used in conjunction with my Christophe Robin conditioner my hair feels like hair again! This has completely replaced the other hair oils I was using (Josie Maran's light Argan oil and Moroccan oil).
Great product makes my curly hair smooth and smells great.
This is the best hair oil!  It is the only treatment that keeps my daughters wavy hair from getting all knotty.  Doesn't have a particular smell which is a good thing...very neutral.

Is it possible to say you love a product when you never really see it or notice it? It is when it's this ghost oil. I put it in my hair while damp and again at the ends once dried. It disappears completely - and I have a ton of fine hair that just LOVES to display any product I use. It smooths all the little hairs and even keeps it from tangling as much. But I've never once looked at it and thought hmm, there's that oil. It's perfect.

I was a loyal Bumble Invisible Oil fan but, Verb's Ghost Oil is comparable AND at a lower price point! The formulation is slightly thicker than Bumble's but, doesn't feel overly greasy. Works amazingly well on my extremely dry/bleached ends. Try it!

I am a hair oil fanatic. I love trying new ones. This one was just OK it was good but not great. It was a bit thicker then I am used to but it worked really well. Gave nice shine and did not weigh down my hair. I use this on wet and dry / styled hair.

reviews.review_title: Favorite hair product of all time
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely IN LOVE with Ghost Oil. I have fine hair but there is a lot of it. Naturally wavy but not necessarily what I would consider the nicest wave? I usually straighten or curl my hair, very rarely do I let it do it's thing because my hair gets ridiculously frizzy and often gets weighed down from product. With other products i have also never been able to just blow dry my hair, I always have to straighten it afterwards to smooth it out.With the Ghost Oil I can blow dry my hair and it is smooth and so shiny without being weighed down. I use two pumps on my hair (medium length, hits the middle of my back) it doesn't leave my hair greasy. Definitely recommending this product to everybody I know

I have unruly, wavy waist length hair that likes to do whatever it wants. My actual hair shaft itself is fine, but I have a LOT of it. Combine that with an oily scalp/seborrheic dermatitis and dry/damaged ends and you get someone who is very selective with what she uses on her hair.   I bought this a week ago when a representative from Verb was in my store. She demonstrated a few of the products on me, so I bought the Ghost Oil on a whim as I was out of my Orofluido elixir.   I didn't think it would be anything special. I was wrong. This is by far the BEST hair oil/serum I have ever used. My hair so much softer and shinier, and I have no oily residue or build-up. I use it after I shower; I hand dry my hair with an old t-shirt then I comb it. I apply one pump from my ears down, a half pump on the last few inches of my hair and then I rub whatever is left on my hands on my head.   My hair has never felt, or looked better from using just one product. The great smell of this is a bonus. It's very clean smelling, not overpowering.   I will say that if you're looking for an oil that will straighten your hair like Moroccan oil, or keratin oils advertise this one won't. It's not heavy enough for that.  Bottom line: if you're looking for an oil that will smooth, de-frizz, detangle, shine, restore, and protect your hail without being heavy and causing buildup PLUS won't cost you a fortune, doesn't contain sulfates, phthalates, parabens, and is cruelty free this is the one.

Soo...it doesn't make any sort of difference, but it does tame my hair and keep tangles away. I'm naturally a brunette & loaded with blonde highlights.   It doesn't make your hair brassy, sticky, extra smell.   But don't turn to this for any sort of hair change like a mask would offer. I didn't buy it again.
Seriously the bomb. I used Aquage before and this is now my favorite. I want to douse myself in it.

I'm loving Verb products!!!  Price is great and products are even better. I have been using their styling cream which I LOVE!!!  So, I decided to try Ghost Oil and I love just as much!  My coarse hair is soft, full and has no frizz. The oil does not weigh down my hair at all.  Verb is now my sole hair product line. Plus, my hairdresser uses at her salon and recommended to me, she said the ingredients are really healthy for hair.

This product is truly amazing, whether you style your hair straight or curly. I have blonde hair and am always wary of oil products for my hair because it can make it look dirty and oily very easily, but this is so light and smoothing, it's fantastic! It keeps your hair so soft, fixes frizz and holds your style! I love the subtle smell (thanks to the moringa oil) and it's a great price! TRY IT! You will not be disappointed.
The best hair oil I've tried and so much cheeper then some that I didn't fond as effective.
Not heavy or greasy at all, despite dispensing super thick. Helps my dry frizzy hair look less damaged, will definitely repurchase. No strong scent either!

Ghost Oil is my new staple! I had been using BB Hairdresser's Invisible Oil and was sold on that until using this! At first I was skeptical because Ghost Oil is a tad heavier in my hand than BB is, but I have thick, curly hair so I think this is what it needs! I use this with the Verb Leave-in Mist and my hair has never been softer or shinier. Salon blow-out quality!!
This stuff is wonderful.  It makes my hair shine and never seems to build up.
This oil smells great and delivers a good amount of moisture and sleekness that I need.

I have dry over processed hair , especially at the ends. This products seems thick, but once applied to the hair it never weighs it down. You hair looks shiny not oily, feels moisturized not greasy. Overall a product worth trying.

I am always looking for new things to tame the frizz of my curls.  I decided to try this because of the price.  Turns out, I love it.  It has a light, fresh fragrance and makes my hair feel like silk.  I've since tried a sample of the shampoo and conditioner and was really impressed at the amount of lather and how far a small bit will go.  I will definitely but this again and plan to buy the full size shampoo and conditioner soon, as well.
Love this oil! It smells so good and makes my hair so soft! Love the price point on Verb products too :)
Started using it just recently. Very light and a very little amount is needed per use. Still waiting for the results of the use to appear :)
One of the Sephora reps recommended this product to me, is light and not greasy but it didn't work on my hair. Not what I expected.

This stuff was good, but I didn't find it particularly life-changing like other reviewers did. I enjoyed the smell, which is fresh and yummy, but it's very very faint, so it didn't linger in my hair (which I kind of wish it did). It has a thick texture that reminds me more of a serum than an oil, which made me surprised that it is as light as it is! It didn't weigh my hair down (my hair is fine but thick and about halfway down my back and I use two pumps) but I prefer an oil with a little bit more to it. My hair is quite dry and it drinks up nourishment like nobodys business so I think there are heavier oils I prefer. I finished this oil up and enjoyed using it, but I don't think I'll repurchase. It's great value for the price though, especially if you have hair that is easily weighed down!

I have hip length hair that is fine but plentiful. I don't even need conditioner if I use the product. It has a wonderful fresh, grassy smell and doesn't cause buildup. My only wish is they'd have a larger size - I go through a bottle a month!

I had a balayage recently and I saw my hairstylist use this product. My hair came out very silky and soft for almost a week now! You don't need to apply this everyday because it's very effective. I usually use Bumble Bumble Invisible Oil and now it's hard which is the best because both are very effective and leaves my hair feeling light, soft, and silky. My colored hair isn't dry yet thanks to Ghost Oil!

I have thick, frizz-prone hair that can't decide if it wants to be straight or wavy when I let it air dry. Either way, it's always a frizzy mess that I either have to style or hide in a pony tail. This is the only oil that I've ever had perfect results with for letting my hair air dry. My hair is mostly wavy and frizz free with this oil-- it's very lightweight. I finally can leave the house with wet hair and not worry about how it will look in a couple of hours!
This is honestly the best hair oil I've ever used! i have very fine thin hair and this is the first oil I've found that doesn't weigh my hair down. This stuff is magic!!!!

As a hairdresser, I have tried every hair serum I can get my hands on! This hair oil is in my top 3, if not my all-time-favorite! I use this daily on myself, whether I blow-dry and style my hair or I let it air dry. I start with two pumps and distribute through my hair and I add more as needed. No matter how much of this product I use, it NEVER makes my hair greasy and I have FINE hair! It smoothes frizz, adds shine and has a light, barely-there scent. My thick-haired friends love it, too! It works for every hair type! Truly, this hair oil is the only one I need and I will continue purchasing this for years to come!
Really great for thin/fine hair. Very lightweight and leaves hair with a nice shine.
Super light weight oil perfect for thin fine hair!! Makes my hair super silky smooth and helps me with my tangles. Highly recommend.
I love how soft my hair feels. Just one shot is all you need! I feel like my hair is less tangled and looks better on day 2 than if I use nothing. I like this better than the Bumble air dry.
Not heavy, not oily, just perfect

I've been looking for a finishing oil to get rid of frizzies once hair is dry. Moroccan oil is just too heavy for my hair and few others work. This one was recommended by a Sephora employee and is very light. Great for straight or curly hair days.
Verb hair oil is amazing! It left my hair super shiny and super soft after just one use, I absolutely love it
This makes your hair so shiny and soft! It's not too expensive too :)
I've been using this once my curls are completely air dried and I love it! Great price! Great shine! Helps the frizz! Smells so good too!

Got this after I saw HeyClaire on YouTube do an updated everyday hair tutorial. I had to try it after I saw all the positive reviews. It smells amazing (lemony, citrusy smell) and helps smooth and tame the frizzies.

I was very hesitant to purchase this because my hair is fine and I live in Austin, where the summer season dominates the calendar year. Hot, humid weather = frizzy, unmanageable hair. However, this stuff is great, and unlike any other hair oil I've tried before. I began using this at night to sleep in with my silk head wrap because I was still worried about using it during the day in fear it would make my hair look greasy and heavy. It got to the point where I was excited to shower first thing when I woke up, because I felt that my hair really soaked this up overnight and made my hair smooth without weighing it down. I've since started using it in the morning in conjunction with curl cream from VERB and my curls form beautifully and hold up well even when it's humid and hot outside. This oil truly is lightweight, and a dream for someone who doesn't have a lot of hair to work with. I love this stuff and will keep it in my hair routine from here on out.
I just started using this and I absolutely love it! It makes my hair so silky and soft, a little goes a long way!

I usually reach for Bumble & bumble Invisible Hairdresser's Oil (which is amazing & fragranced like Tahiti). I grabbed this Verb Ghost Oil on a whim in the store just to try it. (Let's be real. I didn't need another oil, but I was wildly attracted to the name & bottle design, so for $14, why not?) Anyway, this is an even lighter (ghostlier) oil than the B&b product. It adds some light shine and pieceiness to my damaged blonde waves. Mix it, like a cocktail, with that new B&b Surf Foam Spray for lazy hottie cool girl hair. One more thing: the fragrance of this oil reminds me of a mix of faint white beach flowers & potent plastic babydoll heads that have melted in the sun. A bit unconventional for sure, but not remotely unpleasant for me. If you think you might have an aversion to such an aroma, you may not be into this oil. For $14, try it for yourself and find out! As for myself, I'll be going back & forth between Verb & B&b. Xx
Stop the frizz and didn't make my hair greasy.
I was happy to find a serum that didn't make my hair look greasy but it almost made my static worse. Living proof 5 in 1 cream is better
Absolutely amazing. Cuts down my frizz and the amount of products I have to use in my hair. I have fine, thin hair that's very frizzy.
this stuff is like crack for your hair. amazing

I can not get over how fabulous this product is. I have medium length wavy hair with a bit of coarseness. This shuts down any frizz and when I blow dry it dries in about 5 minutes. I have the best second day hair using this product. I love hard products but I really have desire to purchase or try any other hair oil.
Love that this oil does not leave a greasy residue on my hands after application. My hair feels softer, and the smell of this product is great. Would highly recommend.
It works. Not exactly how it is suppose to but it has helped my hair from getting frizzy and make them more manageable
I have super long hair extensions and this hair oil is awesome. So many of them are sticky and gross. This one is weightless and makes my hair feel great!
Makes hair super soft and shiny but weighs it down like crazy :(
works really well on frizzy hair with the styling cream

I have coarse hair that is pretty damaged/textured from getting bleached to go grey, which is to say it's very dry and what not and I've been going crazy with hair oils, masks and treatments to bring my hair back to its healthy self.   I use one pump of this oil every morning, mainly on the ends and I find it definitely controls some of the crazy frizz i get post-sleep. My favourite use-case, though, is pre-heat styling. When I use my iron to create more uniform beach waves in my hair, using this oil before is PERFECT. not only do I feel that it is protecting my hair from the heat, but also with styling. It creates just enough separation and hold as well as moisturization.  my only critique is that the scent. it's not bad and it's also not strong, which I like. I guess i'm more used to higher-end/salon level products that smell a little more... sophisticated? i just wish it smelled a little higher end, but what can I expect when it's only $16!!
I hate this stuff. It does nothing good for my hair. On top of not making my hair look pretty or shiny it really weighs it down and makes my hair get really oily fast. I just don't like it.

reviews.review_title: I guess it's just not for me?
reviews.review_text: So many great reviews I had to try it! I have very coarse, fizzy hair with loose curls, not ringlets. I put it in and it seemed like any product I've used before. All the creams and oils I've used over my years of desperate trials did just as good of a job. Which is to say not a good job. Barely changes my hair.   This product is really nothing special. It made me wash my hair a day earlier than I normally would, that's about it. Really wanted it to work but it's going back.

reviews.review_title: Just Right for my Fine but plentiful Hair
reviews.review_text: I had seen this some time ago and figured I would eventually try it and glad I did.  It's light and does well for my hair.
This makes your hair look amazing! Probably one of the best oils I've ever tried on my hair.

reviews.review_title: I Got That Mommy Off Duty Hair
reviews.review_text: Since I became a new mom my hair routine was basically putting my hair up in a bun or pony tail and an occasional brushing. I bought this oil because I saw the video with Claire Marshall on how to get model off duty hair. I was never good at styling my hair but dang with the right products there's hope for everyone. Not only is this oil affordable but it makes my hair look so shiny and healthy. Since I bought it I've styled my hair almost every day. I will recommend this product to my friends and family and will definitely repurchase and perhaps try other products by Verb. Yay!

This is the perfect post-shower, pre-blow dry serum.  I have fine hair that gets frizzy if I do not use something on it post-shower.  I have tried a lot of different products - Alterna, Kerastase, Cibu, Perfect 10, drug store brand, etc...  I have given so many different products a chance, and have finally found one that I truly do love.  This is by far the best.    How I use it:  - post shower, while hair is still wet I put 4 pumps of the oil in my hair (my hair is fine, but it is almost to the small of my back) - wrap hair in towel for 10 minutes - let air dry until 95% dried - blow dry and style  What it has done for me:  - zero oiliness  - not weighted down (big plus considering my hair length and thickness) - smooth feeling post blow dry - if I do let my hair air dry only, the waviness of my hair is much more manageable.   - minimal frizziness  I am purchasing another bottle of this today, and felt compelled to let others know how wonderful it is.  :)

It softened my hair (highlighted blonde) a bit. Not as much as Josie Maran's serum. I showered and applied 4 pumps to my long, thick hair in the morning but by bed time my hair felt sticky. Overall I'm unimpressed with this hair oil and will not be purchasing again.

I was looking for a hair oil that wouldn't weigh down my frizzy but fine hair. I love this product. My hair is soft and smooth but not weighed down. it has a subtle shine and feels so heathy. I highly recommend it!

I've tried other 'weightless' oils but they always make my fine hair go flat. This stuff really is lightweight and makes my hair far more nourished than just about any other oil I've tried. Didn't expect it to be so good but I am in love.
Changed my hair for the better!
My hair is so soft and tame when i use this stuff. Keeps my curls in check too. Love it! Feels super light on my hair too!
Feels good and helps tame frizz.

I bought this back in the winter when I started noticing my ends were looking a little dry and straw-like.  I wasn't in need of a fresh haircut, it was just the weather playing with my hair.  I bought this and have been using it ever since.    It has really remedied my problem completely!  I just use about half a pump, rub my hands together, and rub it just on my ends (damp hair).  It works great whether I blow dry, or just air dry.  Very lightweight, undetectable, not greasy at all.  Totally recommend!
I really like this! I'm a big fan of hair oils and long to have super shiny locks. The scent isn't too strong, the oil is easy to work into your hair, and it leaves a great shine.
I'm so glad I discovered this! My hair feels hydrated and silky smooth! And it smells amazing. Two pumps is all I need for my thick long hair!
If I could buy a gallon of this stuff, I would. I have used a lot of hair products with little to no success, but this stuff turned my thick, damaged hair soft and manageable almost immediately.

What is this magical substance? I hadn't heard of this brand until looking through Sephora for new hair products and I'm so glad I stumbled upon this beauty. Put a drop in your hands and run it through your hair, little to no sticky residue left in your hands, unlike other more expensive hair oils. This left my hair so silky and light, not weighed down like some oils make your hair feel like. My hair is semi thick and wavy, this felt great! Def recommend!

I threw this in my cart because all the other hair products I was considering were twice the price. For the money, this is a nice product and you get a good amount, as a little goes a long way. I have thick wavy shoulder length hair that I frequently blow dry and flat iron. I've been using this in damp hair prior to heat, and then once I'm done I use it to smooth any fly always. Nice and light and doesn't make your hair look or feel greasy.
I love this product! Great price point, nice amount of product in the bottle and it smells divine! It made my hair super soft and shiny (and a little goes a long way)

I have very thick hair that tends to get dry - especially in the ends. This oil does wonders to make my hair look sleek and glossy, while combating dryness. It just takes one pump and it doesn't make my hair oily and completely disappears, just adding a really nice glossy sheen. Highly recommend.
Feels amazing but in my hair it looks oily. I tried applying it to dry hair, damp hair, a drop in my conditioner....for me it's a hair up day when I use it! Good overall for treatment I found

I bought this to use after I shampoo and condition my hair with the hydrating range from Verb. Love those products and thought I had to try this too. I bought this to replace my hairdressers invisible oil by Bumble and Bumble. I didn't like that oil. It made my hair clump together after it dried. I might have used too much of that but regardless, this does NOT do that. This leaves my hair shiny and soft. Love it and would recommend it

reviews.review_title: Makes my hair shiny, smells good
reviews.review_text: Love it - not too heavy but tames the frizz. Doesn't make hair look greasy. My teenage son said my hair smelled good!
Gives fragrant shine without being greasy. Does not weigh hair down. I use it after flat ironing. Good price point; I would buy again.

I never write reviews for products because I'm too lazy but I HAD to for this. I have tried everything for my frizzy hair: Morrocain Oil, Bumble and Bumble's Hairdresser's Invisible Oil, etc and none of them worked. I used this one my hair after I showered last night, straightened it this morning, and when I was checked out my hair in the mirror later that day, I noticed my hair was sooo shiny and smooth, it didn't feel like my normal hair at all. I didn't know at first why it was so smooth but I remembered using the Ghost Oil. It's inexpensive too so you must try it if you're looking for a solution to frizzy hair.

After just one use I noticed a huge difference! My hair is naturally curly/frizzy and I blow dry it straight every day. Due to the frizz I have to flat iron my hair. After using this I didn't really need the flat iron. My hair is shoulder length and 2 pumps was plenty of product. I recommend this if you're looking for smooth shiny hair.

This stuff is amazing, and for the price you can't beat it. I have tried so many hair oils from Matrix, to Paul Mitchell to B&B but this one is my favorite. Ghost Oil whips my fine, wavy and frizzy hair into shape. It also leaves a beautiful shine and does not weigh my hair down or make it greasy at all. I bought this in November during the sale and I still have a half a bottle left. I use two pumps in my shoulder length hair every time I wash and style, about 4 times a week.

reviews.review_title: Great product, great price & great hair
reviews.review_text: I bought this based on the reviews and the price. I don't mind spending more on my hair but if something works and is not expensive,  it's definitely a great product. I have dry, split ends, my hair is color-treated and medium length. I have tried several other oil products but most of them left my hair feeling kind of gross and greasy. This product made my hair feel amazingly soft and really helped when I used my straightening iron. My hair looked and felt healthy and it only took a little bit of product to work. Would not hesitate to recommend this to anyone who uses a straightener and/or has somewhat damaged hair.
its my top 5 hair products. i have curly frizzy wild hair. a little bit of VERB Ghost Oil my hair is whipped into beautiful frizzles hair. well worth it for only 14 bucks

I received this product as a gift. After reading all the reviews, i thought this would work for my hair. However, this product did not make much of a difference with my curly/frizzy hair. I have returned it and will be try another product.

Hair treatment oils are always so expensive for very little product and they could easily make your freshly washed hair into a greasy disaster depending on just a difference of a few drops you use. This ghost oil, however, is made from many natural oils that are very moisturizing and lightweight. It feels pretty greasy at first, but I do not notice it at all after I blow dry my hair. The pump is a bit frustrating at times but for the price and quality of the oil, I cannot complain about the packaging too much. I've tried a countless amount of hair oil products (including very high-end) and therefore I think everyone is giving this product 5 star reviews because it is great BUT it is not necessarily a miracle oil - just in case if anyone is expecting that. It is made with natural oils, it is lightweight, moisturizing and you get a decent amount of product for the price so it just simply deserves a good rating.

Highly recommend. It does exactly what I was hoping it would do based on the reviews. One thing I like about this, unlike a lot of hair products, is that it's hard to use enough of it in your hair to make your hair look super greasy. It might when you initially put it in, but if you let it sit for a bit and then straighten/blow dry your hair, it's perfect. My ends are really dead but when I use this it actually looks like I have healthy hair, not to mention it is super soft and shiny. All the times I've used it were when I didn't even condition my hair, so I can only imagine how it'd look if I did!

This made my hair very soft. I used it after straightening my hair and it added extra shine. The next morning, my hair was still soft and wasn't oily at all. I look forward to trying it on my naturally wavy towel-dried hair.

I have only used this oil once, but I can already safely say that it's everything I wanted it to be. My hair is soft and shiny, despite being overdue for a haircut. I have naturally pretty oily hair and would only use this on freshly washed hair, and sparingly at first until you get a feel for it. Typically putting any oil in my hair and most products ends up looking like a greasy mess, but not this product.

This is such a wonderful product. I have thick hair that often gets weighed down by product, but this does not at all. In fact, I use it on all three of my daughters hair. They range from thin and straight, thin and wavy and thick straight with a little body. Its a favorite in our house, especially at the price and no extra junk (chemicals)

I have very fine AND very thick hair, so most hair oils just end up making my hair look greasy or weighing it down.  I've tried this on both wet and dry hair and was happy with the results both ways.  This oil does a great job of adding shine and softness! The price is awesome, I've tried a few other Verb products after being so impressed by this one and so far I'm really enjoying them all.

I bought this as I was nearing the end of my Morrocan Oil, and couldn't be bothered to replace it due to the hefty price tag. I was getting Verb's hair mask so figured I would get this too! I LOVE that they don't test on animals!! It works so well. Winter leaves me with dull, staticky, frizzy hair and the Ghost Oil makes it shiny, silky and smooth! LOVE!!

This is a great product for your hair, it adds shine & protection from heat (blower or curling iron). Leaves hair feeling super smooth & soft to the touch. Best of all, I can get 2 days of good hair from 1 application. Only need about 3 or 4 pumps & your hair absorbs it right away. I will definitely be buying this again!
I really like this oil. I use after washing my daughter hair and it gives a nice shine. Also smooth the hair out.

I was skeptical because of how cheap it is, but I love this stuff. I have thick, fluffy Irish hair that is also heavily dyed, and this tames it and makes it look and feel soft, without weighing it down too much.

Does wonders in removing frizz and fly-aways without weighing hair down or feeling greasy. I use about 3 pumps for my thick hair and it always leaves it feeling soft! Unfortunately, it hasn't done anything for the poofiness but that is to be expected.
I've been looking for this all my life. I have wavy/curly hair and this smoothes the frizz without weighing down the hair or making it feel greasy. I use it on damp and dry hair.
I was skeptical since every other oil I tried is too heavy for my fine hair. My hair is usually dry and brittle on the ends but now it is soft.
Works just like it is suppose to. Softens and makes my hair shine. I use a few pumps on wet hair and one pump on dry hair and I have soft, shiny, manageable hair. Great product for the price.❤️

I absolutely love this stuff... I put one squirt in my hair before I blow dry and straighten, and another when I'm done. This makes my hair SOOOOO amazingly soft and it feels so healthy, it adds great shine, and yet at the same time it doesnt make my hair look greasy at all! It helps tame my frizz and my fly-aways from black hair that I've been bleaching blonde for a year, it makes my hair feel amazing. I will never stop using this product, it has become a part of my everyday hair ritual, cant imagine living without it

This oil is a must have. Put an entire pump in your hair before you blow dry, and your hair will feel silky all day long. Blow dried your hair but forgot the oil? Hair frizzed up after being outside all day? That's okay, put a two or three drops in your palms, rub them together to warm them, and put them in your roots. This oil seriously makes my hair look like I am in a shampoo commercial, it is so shiny and looks so healthy.

I'm on my 2nd bottle now. It's very lightweight and absorbs right into my damaged, bleached hair. I only wash my hair twice a week but i can still put this in daily without it looking greasy. When I'm getting close to needing a shampoo i generally just put it on the ends and spray dry shampoo near my roots. It adds shine and softness and protects my hair from breaking off as much, and it's not outrageously expensive.

I have pretty dry and damaged hair from dyeing and styling so I need some pretty hardcore products to make my hair bounce back! Trying this in a whim, and from the positive reviews, I was first pretty happy with the way it felt on my hair and how it made it shiny and manageable. But towards the end of the day my hair felt drier than normal and lacked luster. I tried again after washing my hair thinking it'd be different but the same thing happened. I guess it's hit or miss with everyone.

This stuff is amazing. I bought this along with Verb moisturizing shampoo and conditioner. All are great products for my hair. I have thick, wavy, color damaged hair. I've bought tons of products to try and get it back to normal after too much bleaching. This stuff is so light and moisturizing my hair looks completely different. I use one or two pumps on damp hair and then one more after styling. My hair hasn't looked this good in a couple years.

This product should be called miracle oil instead of ghost oil. I have very long, thick, coarse hair that I heat style often. Not only is my hair softer, shinier, and frizz free, but my blow dry time was somehow miraculously cut in half. You cannot beat the quality and price for this product!

My sister left it in the bathroom and I ended up trying it and wow! It's really light and actually makes a difference in my hair fine, thin, borderline wavy/curly hair. It's shiny, and soft, and a just feels healthier. I had to order my own bottle! We'll see how my hair holds up when it rains tho lol

Usually argon oils and dry oils are too heavy on my fine hair. This stuff is sooo good! I use a bit before I dry my hair and again on dry hair to boost my style. Takes out frizz and doesn't weigh down my fine curly hair. Must have!

I've been using this for a while, but I havent used it with my hair for about a week. I washed and dried my hair today and used it in my hair and straightened my hair. Wow it looks so healthy and shiny, I will not be living without this quality product from here on out :)

i tried this after reading about it on a blog, in desperate need of a fix for my winter ravaged hair. i have super long, fine, wavy hair that gets insanely dry and static-y in winter, with my ends turning brittle, and eventually turning into knots. this stuff completely transformed my hair. i rub about two drops through the bottom half of my hair when it's wet, concentrating on the ends. then i style as usual (bumble & bumble texture at the roots, air dry). the results are bouncy, soft, shiny hair. my ends are silky and my hair looks so much more alive and healthy. didn't weigh hair down at all or make it greasy. i will never be without this product! great price point too. and it will last a long while, even with daily use.

I love a good hair oil but I always have to be SUPER careful to not put too much on my hair. I bought this on a whim because of the price and it is sooooo much lighter than any other oil I've tried. Really great product! My hair looks shiny and it smells great.

I have very fine curly hair that honestly always has split ends (even after a hair cut). I do get my hair colored but I have always tried to use nice products and shampoo/conditioner. I, in the past, always stayed away from oils because I felt as though they made my hair greasy automatically. After reading reviews about this product I decided to order it (and it is only $14). I love it. My hair is softer than it ever has been and the dry, frizzy ends that scream UNHEALTHY are gone. I have normally greasy hair in general so I do still need a shower everyday but I do not think this product is in any way to blame.

My hair is really fine and curl type is 3A/3B and this oil is a game changer. I've been using argan oil for the past year or so but this is so much better. It makes my curls soft and bouncy but not greasy at all.

I love this stuff. I have been searching for years for a light hair oil (love Moroccan oil but it weighs my hair down and gets greasy after one day) so I was very excited to try Bumble's invisible oil. It's okay, but the Verb Ghost Oil takes the gold BY FAR, plus it is half the cost of BB Invisible Oil. It does exactly what it says it will - just a dime sized amount (I have very long, semi thick hair) is enough to soften and add heat protection without weighing my hair down or making it greasy. If I accidentally use too much it still does not make my hair greasy. I even put it on my hair when it is dry sometimes to add shine and it still doesn't make my hair greasy. I have no idea how but this is a miracle oil. It cuts drying time, too. It has a very nice light scent but you can barely notice it. This plus a little BB thickening spray makes for the perfect blowout cocktail. I love this and at $14 a bottle, I'll buy it again and again (still not even halfway though my first one and I've been using it at least twice a week for 3 months). Last but not least, I haven't had a cut since I started using it and I have no split ends or damage, so I think it really is restorative.

reviews.review_title: Made my hair super soft + silky!
reviews.review_text: I bought this product a while ago, and over time it's made my hair probably the nicest it's ever been in my life. I have super fine hair that seems to dry out really easily, even from just being out in the sun regularly. I used to dye my hair a ton too, so it's fair to say my hair started out really stripped. Now though, I can't even find a single split end.
This is the most amazing product I've used for my hair. After I've applied this through my hair for the first time, I immediately noticed how soft and smooth my hair felt. A little goes a long way.

i have very thick & coarse hair - usually need a lot of serum for the effect. Initially, I was using more than 3 pumps and it didn't make my hair heavy at all and surprisingly not greasy!! I switched to lower dose and the effects are the same. Great product. Recommend this over Phyto hair serum.
This oil is LIFE!!!! Not at all greasy, great for frizziness, smells awesome and adds shine.

My hair type is fine and straight. I used this in combination with Verb Hydrating Shampoo, Hydrating Conditioner and Leave In Mist, then blow dried my hair (which I never do) and was totally impressed. The tutorial video is absolutely true. My hair felt silky soft just like it did before colouring my hair. I highly recommend this line. I also used the SEPHORA COLLECTION Gloss: Dual Boar Paddle Brush (which is on it's own an amazing tool for hair).
it does provide silkiness and shine however this product is very heavy on my hair and gets very oily. so i learned to only use one spray onto my fingertips.
This oil is awesome!! My hair's been coloured several times and is hard to detangle after washing - this helps out. It also helps if I'm having a particularly frizzy day!

Ghost Oil is great. It makes my hair crazy soft and doesn't leave any greasy or oily feeling. I use it on wet hair as soon as I get out of the shower and it makes brushing my hair so easy. I use it with the Tangle Teezer and I recommend them together. I used to hate combing out my hair (it is thick as anything) but now it's become easier. I like the shine that the Ghost Oil leaves, and I don't think it makes my hair greasier than usual, although that may change in the summer months as I tend to avoid less products. I look forward to trying other VERB products.

I bought this oil because I am tired of my blonde highlights turning brassy from other oils on the market. I had high hopes that this oil would tame my thick and frizzy hair but it really took many pumps of this product to make even a slight difference in softness or shine. It also dulled my hair a little compared to other oils on the market.

I'm in love with this stuff! I have really long hair that I've had colored regularly for years and it was dry and brittle, really difficult to detangle after washing, so I've been trying tons of different serums and hair oils. This is the best one I've used. I use 3-4 pumps of this and the tangles are gone, blow dries light and silky, very shiny.
Love this! Leaves my hair silky and smooth and not oily!

Honestly, I want to thank the makers of this product personally. I'm a natural extremely dark brunette who has been bleaching her hair super light blonde for years. I thought there was no hope for the straw-like deadness that my hair had until I made an impulsive buy (the packaging tickles my fancy). I've only been using the ghost oil for a week and my hair health and appearance has made a complete 180. I've never been more happy with the look and feel of it!! ITS SO SOFT AND BEAUTIFUL. Thank you Verb!!

This stuff is GREAT. Frizz is at level zero, softness and shine at level 100. And it's less than half the price of Bumble & Bumble's Hairdresser's Invisible Oil! I think this definitely does just a great a job, if not better. I'm switching!!!

My gf and I have similar hair textures (lightly curly/wavey) so it's always been fun to swap and compare hair products. So when she sent me Verb Ghost Oil saying it's really good, I had to try it.  Now my hair requires constant moisture since I live in an arid desert, but I found other daily leave-in conditioners, treatments, and hair oils to be too heavy or had more protein than my hair can handle leaving it dry and brittle. Verb's Ghost Oil is pretty much fit what I needed, moisture without protein or making my curly coils droopy and sad.  I usually put in one or two pumps in my hair after a shower which in conjunction with air-drying makes my hair bouncy and soft. On days I want to straight iron, adding one pump on dry hair before using my straight iron helps my hair out in damage prevention and makes it soft and shiny.  So if you want a non-greasy, lightweight product for making your hair happy everyday, I suggest Verb Ghost Oil. It's a definite on the rebuy list for me.

I purchased this product after watching @heyclaire My Everyday Hair Style Youtube video (https://youtu.be/R0tVXZ3in6w). I've used argan oil, moraccan oil and macadamia oil (not at the same time) to revitalize my normal, dry scalp Asian hair and repair split ends. These oils are too heavy to brush through my hair because day-2 hair for me is extra shiny and oily. Everything has worked at a certain point, but nothing was super spectacular.  This product has changed my hair to look healthier especially during this cold weather. After washing my hair, I use one pump to massage onto my scalp and brush remaining product through from root to tip. By the morning, my hair looks and feels smooth and healthy which is something that the 3 oils have never done before. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to try a different hair oil if they've used everything under the umbrella. It's lightweight, non-greasy, lightly scented, very affordable, and a little goes a long way.

I'm always skeptical of hair oils and the claims that come with them. However this hair oil is now an exception! I tried this product the first time before I got my hair trimmed (which was much needed!) And I was not a fan, it tended to gum up in my dead ends and give it a funky texture. But now that my hair is trimmed this product preforms beautifully. It helps keep my hair detangled while adding a subtle shine that doesn't look greasy or heavy in my hair. Will be repurchasing!!
This didn't do anything for me. Whether I use it on dry or wet hair, whether it's on curly or straight hair, it does NOTHING. It does smell good, but that's all.

omg i absolutely LOVE this!! my hair is SO sleek & shiny no matter what shampoo & conditioner! i get so many compliments on my hair and people have stopped and asked me what i used. i was cashing out at sephora and the girl was freaking out over my hair and told me to tell her my secrets! lol! i
Bought this instead of hairdresser oil, mostly because of price, and I love it! My hair looks so shiney and feels so soft, without being greasy. 10/10 will purchase again.
I absolutely adore this product. It adds shine but doesn't make my hair greasy. Simply amazing and will definitely be repurchasing!
This is the best thing i have ever bought for my hair. Helps with my frizzy dry hair, you can not imagine! I love this stuff. I will only be buying this stuff from now on.

If you're a guy that uses a blow dryer, get Ghost Oil. Just a little drop after you get out of the shower and your hair won't dry out. This stuff will last you months and leave your hair nice and healthy.

I've tried what I feel is every oil out there. Argan oil. Macademia oil. Caudalie's divine oil... and many more (those are just the ones I 100% remember purchasing and trying)  All of them left my hair looking greasy (if not immediately, shortly after use). I bought this and was skeptical, but figured.. its sephora, if I hate it I'll just return it.  OMG, it's amazing. My hair is so shiny, and isn't weighed down at all.. in fact I almost wish it did have a bit more weight, haha, because without product my hair kind of floats on its own (even after flat ironed). NBD, I'll just use hairspray and/or other products in combination.  Still, I'm so excited to get to have glossy hair that doesn't feel and look like an oil slick.
I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! I only use a small amount; the size of a pea. It is superb!!!

This product has almost no scent and has a nice consistency. A small drop (half the size of a dime) will cover most of the length of my hair. It feels weightless and controls frizz well. I run the leftover product over my roots as well to control flyaway a - doesn't get greasy and still feels very light.  The downside is that it is hard to wash off from my hands after application. I wonder how much product actually goes on my hair and how much is leftover on my palms..:/
Awesome for dry hair especially in winter.

I LOVE THIS STUFF! I have extremely oily hair and this oil absorbs so quick and leave my hair smooth frizz free and shiny I've been getting so many compliments on how my hair looks healthy because of this ghost oil. AND ITS ONLY $14

Um this stuff is the best! Not greasy it absorbs so nicely into hair whether it's wet or dry. Makes my blow drying quicker, hair soft and shiny! Never weighs it down. I use one pump and good to go. It has a very very light scent. Keeps frizz away. I have nothing bad to say about this. Go get this your hair will thank you!
I received this in a kit with other Verb products and they've all replaced my previous brand. The ghost oil works nicely - keeping my curls shiny and not greasy. Goodbye Moroccan Oil!

I am always cautious with oils, fearing they will make my hair look greasy. This product is light, barely any scent, and makes my light blonde hair SO SHINY! I have received so many compliments about how healthy my hair looks, someone even said my hair had never looked so good before! This product is my little secret to amazing, shiny, healthy looking hair.

reviews.review_title: I use this everyday - and it's travel sized!
reviews.review_text: I run just a drop or two of this ghost oil through my hair everyday, gives it a healthy sheen, smells great, and never feels too oily like a lot of others. Big bonus: it's travel sized! I travel for work and never have to worry if TSA will take this away

lightweight and makes my fried, bleached ends feel soft and perfect again. this is a huge feat because most products that would do this also make my fine hair oily, but ghost oil disappears, leaving just the effect and not the oil.

This was recommended to me as a way to smooth frizzy hair, condition it lightly and give it some extra shine. I was told I could use it on dry or wet hair, with the bonus of moisturizing my hands also. I liked the cruelty-free aspect and moderate price, so I bought the story.  Verb Ghost Oil isn't doing anything for me. My hair is fine and wavy. This must be for other hair textures. A fine misting of salad oil gives me the same result, no joke. Verb just smells better.

I use this ghost oil everyday on my ends. A little bit goes a long way, so this will last you a while! I already use the leave in conditioner from verb but this is that stuff that gives you the extra moisture my ends need. My hair is so much healthier looking now and I've noticed less split ends since I've used this!
along with the dry shampoo I always have this stuff in my bag beyond the lightweight that stops frizz it smells wonderful and doesn't ever make my hair greasy but the good kinda shine. Love it!

I LOVE this hair oil - it's super lightweight but still strong enough to tame frizz and smooth the texture of my hair, which is wavy and very thick. I use before I blow dry, and the oil is light enough that I add a bit after drying too to tame flyaways. Highly recommend!

The first hair oil I have ever been able to use! I have super fine, but dry and processed hair. Verb Ghost oil is the answer to my prayers! It adds shine, helps smooth frizz and helps protect my split ends. I also use it as a lotion in the winter!

Usually i dont use daily conditioner for hair until i get to know about this product! This product makes my hair really smooth and shine without noticing that i put something on my hair! I love ghost hair line sooo much!!!
